verse.content: Yesu Kristo, [Nyankopɔn ba]
asɛmpa no mfitiaseɛ.
Sɛdeɛ wɔatwerɛ no wɔ Odiyifoɔ Yesaia nwoma no mu sɛ:

block_quote.content: Hwɛ, meresoma me bɔfoɔ adi w’anim
Obi nne reteam ɛserɛ so sɛ:

verse.content: Yohane ba bɛbɔɔ asu wɔ ɛserɛ so, na ɔkaa adwensakyera asubɔ a ɛde kɔ bɔne fakyɛ mu.
Na Yuda asase sofoɔ nyinaa ne Yerusalemfoɔ firi kɔɔ ne nkyɛn, na wɔkaa wɔn bɔne maa no bɔɔ wɔn nyinaa asu, Asubɔnten Yordan mu.
Na Yohane fira yoma nwi ntoma, ɛnna nwoma abɔsoɔ bɔ n’asene, na ɔdi ntutummɛ ne wiram woɔ.
Na ɔpaee mu kaa sɛ: Deɛ ne ho yɛ den sene me di m’akyi reba a mensɛ sɛ mekoto mesane ne mpaboa homa.
Me deɛ, mede nsuo na ɛbɔ mo asu, na ɔno deɛ, ɔde Honhom Kronkron na ɛbɛbɔ mo asu.
Na ɛbaa sɛ nna no mu no, Yesu firi Nasaret a ɛwɔ Galilea bae, na Yohane bɔɔ no asu wɔ Asubɔntene Yordan mu.
Na ɔfirii nsuo no mu no, ntɛm ara na ɔhunuu sɛ ɔsoro abue, na Honhom no resiane sɛ aburuburo aba ne soɔ.
Na ɛnne bi firi soro baa sɛ: Wone me dɔba a wosɔ m’ani!
Na amonom hɔ ara, Honhom no faa no ntɛm so kɔɔ ɛserɛ so.
Na ɔdii ɛserɛ so hɔ adaduanan, na Satan sɔɔ no hwɛe, na ɔne mmoa na ɛwɔ hɔ, na abɔfoɔ bɛsomm no.
Na wɔyii Yohane maeɛ akyiri no, Yesu baa Galilea bɛkaa Nyankopɔn ho asɛmpa kyerɛe.
Na ɔkaa sɛ:

wj.content: Ɛberɛ no awie du, Nyankopɔn ahennie no abɛn. Monsakyera mo adwene, na monnye asɛmpa no nni.

verse.content: Na ɔnenam Galilea Po ho no, ɔhunuu Simon ne ne nua Andrea sɛ wɔregu asau ɛpo no mu; ɛfiri sɛ na wɔyɛ apofofoɔ.
Na Yesu see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Mommɛdi m’akyi, na mɛma moayɛ nnipa yifoɔ.

verse.content: Na ntɛm ara wɔgyaa wɔn asau no hɔ bɛdii n’akyi.
Na ɔfiri hɔ kɔɔ n’anim kakra no, ɔhunuu Sebedeo ba Yakobo ne ne nua Yohane sɛ wɔn nso wɔ kodoɔ mu retetɛ wɔn asau mu.
Na ntɛm ara ɔfrɛɛ wɔn, na wɔgyaa wɔn agya Sebedeo ne apaafoɔ no kodoɔ no mu bɛdii n’akyi.
Na wɔkɔduruu Kapernaum. Na homeda duruiɛ no, ntɛm ara ɔkɔɔ hyiadan mu kɔkyerɛkyerɛeɛ.
Na ne nkyerɛkyerɛ no yɛɛ wɔn ahodwiri, ɛfiri sɛ ɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ wɔn sɛdeɛ ɔwɔ tumi, na ɛnyɛ sɛ Atwerɛfoɔ no!
Na ɛberɛ korɔ no ara, na onipa bi wɔ wɔn hyiadan no mu a ɔwɔ honhom fi, na ɔteaa mu sɛ:
Ɛdeɛn na yɛne wo Yesu Nasareni wɔ yɛ? Wobaa sɛ worebɛsɛe yɛn anaa? Menim wo nipa ban, Onyankopɔn Hoteeni no.
Na Yesu teateaa no sɛ:

wj.content: Mua w’ano na firi ne mu kɔ!

verse.content: Na honhom fi no maa no senseneeɛ, na ɔde nne kɛseɛ teaa mu, na ɔfirii ne mu kɔeɛ.
Na ɛyɛɛ wɔn nyinaa ahodwiri maa wɔbisabisaa wɔn ho sɛ: Ɛdeɛn ni? Nkyerɛkyerɛ foforɔ! Ɔde tumi hyɛ ahonhom fi mpo na wɔtie no.
Na ɛhɔ ara na ne ho asɛm firi trɛ kɔɔ Galilea nsase a atwa ho ahyia nyinaa so.
Na wɔfirii hyiadan no mu no, ntɛm ara na wɔne Yakobo ne Yohane kɔɔ Simon ne Andrea fie.
Na Simon asebaa afoɛ da hɔ, na ntɛm ara wɔkaa ne ho asɛm kyerɛɛ no.
Na Yesu ba bɛsɔɔ ne nsa maa no so, na foɛ no gyaee, na ɔfirii aseɛ somm wɔn.
Na ɛduruu anwummerɛ a owia kɔtɔeɛ no, wɔde wɔn a wɔn ho nyɛ wɔn den ne wɔn a wɔwɔ ahonhommɔne nyinaa brɛɛ no.
Na kuro mu no nyinaa bɛkyeree so ɛpono no ano.
Na ɔsaa nnipa bebree a wɔyare nyarewa ahodoɔ pii yadeɛ, na ɔtuu ahonhommɔne pii; na wamma ahonhommɔne no kwan sɛ wɔnkasa, ɛfiri sɛ na wɔnim no.
Na ɔsɔree ahemadakye firii adi, na ɔkɔɔ ɛserɛ so baabi kɔbɔɔ mpaeɛ wɔ hɔ.
Na Simon ne wɔn a wɔka ne ho no tii no;
na wɔhunuu no no, wɔsee no sɛ: Nnipa nyinaa rehwehwɛ wo.
Na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Momma yɛnkɔ nkuro a ɛdeda hɔ no mu, na menkɔka asɛmpa no ɛhɔ nso; na yei nti na mebaeɛ.

verse.content: Na ɔkɔ kɔkaa asɛm no wɔ wɔn hyia adan mu wɔ Galilea nyinaa, na ɔtuu ahonhommɔne.
Na ɔkwatani bi baa ne nkyɛn bɛsrɛɛ no, na ɔkotoo no, see no sɛ: Sɛ wopɛ a, wobɛtumi ama me ho afi.
Na ɔyɛɛ no mmɔbɔ, na ɔtenee ne nsa kaa no, na ɔsee no sɛ:

wj.content: Mepɛ, wo ho mfi.

verse.content: Na ntɛm ara, kwata no firii ne ho, na ne ho firiiɛ.
Na Yesu baraa no dendeenden, na ɔmaa no firii adi ntɛm ara.
Na ɔsee no sɛ:

wj.content: Hwɛ, nka asɛm biara nkyerɛ obiara, na kɔ na fa wo ho kɔkyerɛ ɔsɔfoɔ na w’ahofire nti, kɔma deɛ Mose hyɛeɛ no, na ɛnyɛ adanseɛ mma wɔn!

verse.content: Na ɔno deɛ, ɔfirii adie no, ɔfitii aseɛ kekaa no pii, na ɔmaa asɛm no trɛe, ɛno nti Yesu antumi anyi n’anim ankɔ kuro biara mu bio; na mmom ɔtenaa ɛserɛ so hɔnom baabi, na wɔfiri mmaa nyinaa baa ne nkyɛn.

note.content: Tete atwerɛ afoforɔ a wɔgye to mu binom mfa Nyankopɔn ba nka ho.

verse.content: Na nna bi akyiri no, ɔkɔɔ Kapernaum bio, na wɔtee sɛ ɔwɔ fie.
Na nnipa pii bɛhyiae a enti wɔansene aboboano hɔ mpo; na ɔkaa asɛm no kyerɛɛ wɔn.
Na wɔde obi a ɔyare mmubuo a nnipa baanan so no brɛɛ no.
Na ɛsiane nkurɔfokuo no nti, na wɔntumi mmɛn no no, wɔkɔpaa ɛdan a ɔwɔ mu no so; na wɔtuu tokuro de kɛtɛ a obubuani no da soɔ no faa mu gyaagyaa no too mu.
Na Yesu hunuu wɔn gyidie no, ɔsee obubuani no sɛ:

wj.content: Ɔba, wɔde wo bɔne akyɛ wo.

verse.content: Na Atwerɛfoɔ a wɔtete hɔ no mu binom dwendwenee wɔn akoma mu sɛ:
Adɛn nti na oyi kasa saa? Ɔka abususɛm. Hwan na ɔbɛtumi de bɔne akyɛ, gye Onyankopɔn nko ara?
Na ntɛm ara a Yesu hunuu ne honhom mu sɛ wɔredwendwene wɔn mu saa no, ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Adɛn nti na modwendwene yeinom mo akoma mu?
Deɛ ɛwɔ he na ɛyɛ mmerɛ, sɛ wɔbɛse obubuani no sɛ: Wɔde wo bɔne akyɛ wo, anaasɛ: Sɔre, fa wo kɛtɛ na nante?
Na sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ na mobɛhunu sɛ Onipa Ba no wɔ tumi asase so sɛ ɔde bɔne kyɛ nti,

verse.content: ɔsee obubuani no sɛ:

wj.content: Mese wo sɛ: Sɔre, fa wo kɛtɛ na kɔ wo fie!

verse.content: Na ɔsɔreeɛ, na ntɛm ara ɔfaa ne kɛtɛ firii wɔn nyinaa anim kɔeɛ; na ɛmaa wɔn nyinaa ho dwirii wɔn, na wɔhyɛɛ Onyankopɔn animuonyam kaa sɛ: Yɛnhunuu sei bi da!
Na ɔfirii adi bio kɔɔ mpoano; na nkurɔfoɔ no nyinaa baa ne nkyɛn, na ɔfirii aseɛ kyerɛkyerɛɛ wɔn.
Na ɔretwam no, ɔhunuu Alfeo ba Lewi sɛ ɔte atogyeeɛ, na Yesu see no sɛ: Di m’akyi. Na ɔsɔre dii n’akyi.
Na ɛbaa sɛ ɔte adidiiɛ ne fie no, togyefoɔ ne nnebɔneyɛfoɔ bebree ne Yesu ne n’asuafoɔ bɛtenaa adidiiɛ; na wɔn a wɔdii n’akyi no dɔɔso.
Na Atwerɛfoɔ a wɔfiri Farisifoɔ mu no hunuu sɛ ɔne togyefoɔ ne nnebɔneyɛfoɔ redidie no, wɔbisaa n’asuafoɔ no sɛ: Adɛn nti na ɔne togyefoɔ ne nnebɔneyɛfoɔ redidie yi?
Na Yesu teeɛ no, ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Wɔn a wɔwɔ ahoɔden no, ɛnhia wɔn ɔyaresafoɔ na mmom wɔn a wɔyareɛ no. Mammɛfrɛ teneneefoɔ, na mmom mebɛfrɛɛ nnebɔneyɛfoɔ.

verse.content: Na Yohane asuafoɔ ne Farisifoɔ redi abuada; na nnipa bi bɛbisaa no sɛ: Adɛn nti na Yohane asuafoɔ ne Farisifoɔ asuafoɔ di abuada, na w’asuafoɔ deɛ, wɔnni abuada?
Ɛnna Yesu see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Ayeforɔkunu ne wɔn wɔ hɔ yi, ayeforɔhyia ahɔhoɔ no bɛtumi adi abuada anaa? Mmerɛ dodoɔ a ayeforɔkunu no wɔ wɔn nkyɛn no deɛ, wɔrentumi nni abuada.
Na nna bi bɛba a wɔbɛfa ayeforɔkunu no afiri wɔn nkyɛn, ɛno mu na wɔbɛdi abuada.
Obi mfa ntoma foforɔ sini ntɛ atadeɛ dada mu, anyɛ saa a, ntɛmu no bɛte afiri mu, foforɔ no bɛfiri dada no mu, na nteteeɛ no ayɛ kɛseɛ.

Na obi mfa bobesa foforɔ ngu nwoma nkotokuo dada mu; anyɛ saa a, bobesa foforɔ no bɛpaepae nkotokuo no, na bobesa no ahwiehwie agu, na nkotokuo no nso asɛe. Na wɔde bobesa foforɔ gu nkotokuo foforɔ mu.

verse.content: Na ɛbaa sɛ ɔkɔfaa aburoofuo bi mu homeda bi; na n’asuafoɔ no rekorɔ no, wɔfitii aseɛ pempanee aburoo mmɛtem no bi.
Na Farisifoɔ no see no sɛ: Hwɛ, adɛn nti na wɔreyɛ deɛ ɛnni ho kwan sɛ wɔyɛ no homeda yi?
Na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Monkenkanee deɛ Dawid yɛeɛ, ɛberɛ a ɛhiaa no, na ɛkɔm dee no ne wɔn a wɔka ne ho no pɛn?
Sɛdeɛ ɔkɔɔ Nyankopɔn fie, Ɔsɔfopanin Abiatar berɛ so, na ɔkɔdii Kyerɛ paanoo a obiara nni ho kwan sɛ ɔdie, gye asɔfoɔ nko ara, na ɔmaa wɔn a wɔne no nam no bi nso no?

verse.content: Na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Onipa nti na wɔyɛɛ homeda, na ɛnyɛ homeda nti na wɔyɛɛ nnipa.
Enti Onipa Ba no yɛ homeda nso wura.

verse.content: Na ɔkɔɔ hyiadan mu bio. Na onipa bi wɔ hɔ a ne nsa adwodwo,
na wɔtɛɛ no sɛ ɔbɛsa no yadeɛ homeda anaa, na wɔakɔtoto n’ano.
Na ɔsee onipa a ne nsa adwodwoɔ no sɛ:

wj.content: Sɔre gyina ha.

verse.content: Na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Ɛwɔ ho kwan sɛ wɔyɛ papa anaa bɔne homeda? Sɛ wɔgye obi nkwa anaasɛ wɔkum no? Na wɔyɛɛ komm.

verse.content: Na ɔde abufuo hwɛɛ wɔn hyiae, na wɔn akomaden nti ɛyɛɛ no ya, na ɔsee onipa no sɛ:

wj.content: Tene wo nsa.

verse.content: Na ɔteneeɛ; na ne nsa no sane yɛɛ yie.
Na Farisifoɔ no firii adie no, ntɛm ara wɔne Herodefoɔ kɔtuu ne ho agyina sɛdeɛ wɔbɛsɛe no.
Na Yesu ne n’asuafoɔ no twee wɔn ho kɔɔ mpoano; na nnipakuo pii firi Galilea dii n’akyi, na wɔn a wɔfiri Yudea,
Yerusalem, Idumea, Yordan agya ne wɔn a wɔwɔ Tiro ne Sidon fam, nnipakuo pii a wɔtee nnoɔma a ɔyɛeɛ no baa ne nkyɛn.
Na ɔsee n’asuafoɔ no sɛ, nkurɔfokuo no nti wɔmma kodoɔ ketewa bi ntwɛn no, na wɔankyere ne so.
Na ɔsaa nnipa pii yadeɛ nti, wɔn a wɔyareyare nyinaa bɛkyeree ne so sɛ wɔrebɛsosɔ ne mu.
Na ahonhom fi nso hu no a, wɔhwehwe ase n’anim, na wɔteam sɛ: Wone Nyankopɔn ba no.
Na Yesu baraa wɔn ketee sɛ wɔnnyi no nkyerɛ.
Na ɔkɔɔ bepɔ so; na ɔfrɛɛ wɔn a ɔno ara pɛ, na wɔbaa ne nkyɛn.
Na ɔyii wɔn mu dummienu sɛ wɔnka ne ho, na ɔnsoma wɔn asɛnka,
na wɔanya ahonhommɔne tuo so tumi.
Na ɔyii dummienu no, ɔtoo Simon din Petro;
Sebedeo ba Yakobo ne ne nua Yohane, na ɔtoo wɔn din Bo-anerges, aseɛ ne aprannaa mma;
ne Andrea, ne Filipo ne Bartolomeo, ne Mateo ne Toma, ne Alfeo ba Yakobo, ne Tadeo, ne Kanani Simon,
ne Yuda Iskariot a ɔyii no maeɛ no.
Na ɔbaa fie; na nkurɔfokuo bɛhyiaa bio a enti wɔantumi annidi mpo.
Na n’abusuafoɔ teeɛ no, wɔfiri baa sɛ wɔrebɛtwe no akɔ, ɛfiri sɛ wɔkaa sɛ: Ne tiri mu ka no.
Na Atwerɛfoɔ a wɔfiri Yerusalem baeɛ no kaa sɛ: Ɔwɔ Beelsebul, na ahonhommɔne panin so na ɔnam tutu ahonhommɔne.
Na ɔfrɛɛ wɔn baa ne nkyɛn no, ɔkasa kyerɛɛ wɔn mmebuo mu sɛ:

wj.content: Ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na Satan bɛtumi atu Satan?
Na sɛ ahennie bi ne ne ho di asie a, ahennie no ntumi nnyina.
Na sɛ efie bi ne ne ho di asie a, efie no ntumi nnyina.
Na sɛ Satan sɔre ɔno ara ne so, na ɔne ne ho di asie a, ɔrentumi nnyina, ɛnneɛ na n’awieeɛ ara ne no.
Obi ntumi nkɔ ɔhoɔdenfoɔ fie nkɔto nhyɛ no so mfom n’afideɛ mfa, gye sɛ ɔkyekyere ɔhoɔdenfoɔ no kane, ansa na wafom ne fie nnoɔma.
Nokorɛ mese mo sɛ, wɔde nnipa mma bɔne ne abususɛm a wɔbɛka nyinaa bɛkyɛ wɔn;
na mmom deɛ ɔbɛka abususɛm atia Honhom Kronkron no deɛ, ɔrennya fakyɛ da, na daa afobuo da ne so.

verse.content: Ɛfiri sɛ wɔkaa sɛ: Ɔwɔ honhom fi.
Ɛnna ne na ne ne nuanom ba bɛgyinaa afikyire, soma kɔɔ ne nkyɛn kɔfrɛɛ no.
Na nkurɔfokuo tete ne ho. Na wɔsee no sɛ: Hwɛ, wo na ne wo nuanom gyina adihɔ rehwehwɛ wo.
Na ɔbuaa wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Hwannom ne me na ne me nuanom?

verse.content: Na ɔtwaa n’ani hwɛɛ wɔn a wɔtete ne ho hyiaeɛ no, ɔkaa sɛ:

wj.content: Hwɛ, me na ne me nuanom nie!
Na obiara a ɔbɛyɛ deɛ Onyankopɔn pɛ no, ɔno ara ne me nuabarima ne me nuabaa ne me na.

verse.content: Na ɔfitii aseɛ kyerɛkyerɛɛ bio wɔ mpoano; na nkurɔfokuo pii hyia baa ne nkyɛn, enti ɔkɔɔ kodoɔ mu kɔtenaa ase ɛpo no ani; na nkurɔfokuo no nyinaa wɔ mpoano asase no so.
Na ɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ wɔn nnoɔma pii wɔ mmebuo mu, na ɔsee wɔn ne nkyerɛkyerɛ no mu sɛ:
Montie:

wj.content: Hwɛ, ogufoɔ bi firii adi kɔguu aba.
Na ɛbaa sɛ ɔreguo no, ebi kɔguu kwankyɛn; na ewiem nnomaa ba bɛsosɔeɛ.
Na ebi kɔguu aboɔ so, deɛ dɔteɛ pii nnie; na ntɛm ara na ɛfifiriiɛ, ɛfiri sɛ na dɔteɛ no mu nnɔ ntira;
na owia firiiɛ no, ɛkusaeɛ, ɛsiane sɛ na ɛnni nhini nti, ɛwuiɛ.
Na ebi kɔguu nkasɛɛ mu; na nkasɛɛ no nyiniiɛ, na ɛmiaa no, na anso aba.
Na ebi kɔguu asase pa mu; na ɛfifirii kɔɔ so nyinii na ɛtrɛe na ɛsoe, ebi aduasa, ebi aduosia, ebi ɔha.

verse.content: Na ɔkaa sɛ:

wj.content: Deɛ ɔwɔ aso bɛtie no, ma no ntie!

verse.content: Na ɛkaa ɔno nko no, wɔn a wɔwɔ ne ho ne dummienu no bisaa no ɛbɛ no ase.
Na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Mo deɛ, wɔde ama mo sɛ monhunu Nyankopɔn ahennie ho ahuntasɛm no; na wɔn a wɔwɔ akyire no deɛ, wɔkyerɛ wɔn ne nyinaa mmebuo mu;
na ehunu deɛ wɔahunu, na wɔanhunu mu,
na ɛteɛ nso wɔate, na wɔante aseɛ,
na da bi wɔansakyera, na wɔamfa wɔn bɔne ankyɛ wɔn.

verse.content: Na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Monnim bɛ yi? Na ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na mobɛhunu mmɛ no nyinaa?
Ogufoɔ no gu asɛm no.
Na yeinom ne wɔn a wɔwɔ kwankyɛn no: Faako a wɔgu asɛm no, sɛ wɔnya te a, ntɛm ara Satan ba, na ɔbɛyi asɛm a wɔagu wɔ wɔn mu no.
Na yeinom nso ne wɔn a wɔgu wɔn aboɔ so no: Wɔn na wɔnya te asɛm no a, ntɛm ara wɔde anigyeɛ gye,
na ɛnnye nhini wɔn mu, na wɔwɔ hɔ berɛ tiaa bi; na akyire yi no, sɛ asɛm no nti ahohia anaa ɔtaa ba a, ntɛm ara na ato wɔn suntidua.
Na yeinom ne wɔn a wɔgu wɔn nkasɛɛ mu no: Wɔne wɔn a wɔte asɛm no,
na ɔbra yi mu dadwene ne ahonyadeɛ nnaadaa ne nnoɔma a ɛkeka ho no ho akɔnnɔ ba mu a, ɛmia asɛm no, na ɛnso aba.
Na yeinom ne wɔn a wɔguu wɔn asase pa mu no: Wɔn a wɔte asɛm no, na wɔgyeɛ, na wɔso aba, ebi aduasa, na ebi aduosia, na ebi ɔha.

verse.content: Na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Wɔde kanea ba sɛ wɔde bɛhyɛ koraa anaasɛ mpa ase anaa? Ɛnyɛ sɛ wɔde bɛsi kaneadua soɔ anaa?
Na biribiara nni kɔkoam a wɔrenyi no adie, anaasɛ wɔde ahunta a ɛrenna adie.
Sɛ obi wɔ aso a ɔde bɛtie a, ma no ntie!

verse.content: Na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Monhwɛ yie deɛ moteɛ no ho. Susukoraa ko a mode susuo no, wɔde bɛsusu ama mo, na wɔde bi bɛka mo ho.
Na deɛ ɔwɔ no, wɔbɛma no bebree; na deɛ ɔnnie no, deɛ ɔwɔ mpo wɔbɛgye afiri ne nsam!

verse.content: Na ɔkaa sɛ:

wj.content: Sɛdeɛ Nyankopɔn ahennie no teɛ nie: Ɛte sɛ onipa bi bɛgu aba wɔ fam,
na ɔda, na ɔnyane anadwo ne awia, na aba no fifire, na ɛnyini, na ɔnnim sɛdeɛ ɛyɛeɛ.
Na asase no ara so aba, ɛyi ahahan kane, na afei ayɛ bɛtem, na afei ayɛ ayuo a anyini bɛtem no mu.
Na sɛ aba no nyini a, ntɛm ara ɔsoma ma wɔde kantankrankyi kɔ, ɛfiri sɛ twaberɛ no adu.

verse.content: Na ɔkaa sɛ:

wj.content: Ɛdeɛn ho na yɛde Nyankopɔn ahennie no bɛtoɔ? Anaasɛ ɛbɛ bɛn na yɛbɛbu no ho?
Ɛte sɛ sinapi aba fua a wɔdua no fam a ɛyɛ aba ahodoɔ a ɛwɔ asase so nyinaa mu ketewa,
na wɔdua a, ɛnyini na ɛyɛ kɛseɛ sene fan nyinaa, na ɛyiyi mman akɛseɛ, na ewiem nnomaa tumi tena ne nwunu ase.

verse.content: Na mmɛ a ɛtete sɛɛ pii na ɔde kaa asɛm kyerɛɛ wɔn, sɛdeɛ wɔtumi te aseɛ.
Na wankwati bɛ ankasa ankyerɛ wɔn; na ɛka wɔn nko ara a, ɔkyerɛ n’asuafoɔ no ne nyinaa ase.
Na da no ara, ɛduruu anwummerɛ no, ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Momma yɛntwa nkɔ asuogya nohoa.

verse.content: Na wɔgyaa nkurɔfokuo no kwan no, wɔfaa no kaa wɔn ho kodoɔ no mu sɛdeɛ ɔteɛ no ara; na akodoɔ bi nso ka ne ho.
Na ahum kɛseɛ bi tui, na asorɔkyeɛ bubu bɛguu kodoɔ no mu a na ɛreyɛ ayɛ ma.
Na ɔno deɛ ɔwɔ kodoɔ no to, ada sumiiɛ so. Ɛnna wɔnyanee no see no sɛ: Kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ, yɛremem yi, ɛmfa wo ho anaa?
Na Yesu sɔre teateaa mframa no, na ɔsee ɛpo no sɛ:

wj.content: Mua w’ano; yɛ komm!

verse.content: Na mframa no gyaee, na ɛyɛɛ dinn koraa.
Na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Adɛn nti na moyɛ ahufoɔ sɛɛ? Adɛn na monni gyidie?

verse.content: Na wɔsuroo yie, na wɔsesee wɔn ho sɛ: Onipa bɛn ara ni na mframa ne ɛpo mpo tie no yi?
Na wɔduruu ɛpo no agya, Gerasefoɔ asase so.
Na ɔfirii kodoɔ mu no, ntɛm ara na onipa bi a ɔwɔ honhom fi firi abodan mu wɔ asieeɛ hyiaa no;
ɔno na ɔde aboda no mu ayɛ ne tenaberɛ. Na obiara ntumi mfa nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn mpo nkyekyere no bio.
Na wɔtaa de no to mpokyerɛ ne nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn mu, nanso ɔtete nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn no bubu mpokyerɛ no mu; na obiara ntumi nnwodwo no.
Na daa, awia ne anadwo, ɔwɔ aboda mu ne mmepɔ so teateam, na ɔde aboɔ twitwa ne ho.
Na ɔhunuu Yesu wɔ akyirikyiri no, ɔtuu mmirika bɛkotoo no,
na ɔde nne kɛseɛ teaa mu sɛ: Ɛdeɛn na me ne wo Yesu, Onyankopɔn a ɔwɔ sorosoro no ba wɔ yɛ? Medɔ Onyankopɔn sɛ: Nha me!
Ɛfiri sɛ wase no sɛ:

wj.content: Wo honhom fi, firi onipa no mu.

verse.content: Na Yesu bisaa no sɛ:

wj.content: Wo din de sɛn?

verse.content: Na ɔbuaa sɛ: Me din de Ɛdɔm, ɛfiri sɛ, yɛyɛ bebree.
Na ɔsrɛɛ no pii sɛ ɔmmpam wɔn mmfiri asase no so.
Nso na mprakokuo pii wɔ bepɔ no so hɔ redidi.
Na ahonhommɔne no nyinaa srɛɛ no sɛ: Pam yɛn kɔ mprako no mu, na yɛnkɔhyɛne wɔn mu.
Na ɔmaa wɔn kwan. Na ahonhom fi no firii adi kɔhyɛnee mprako no mu, na mprakokuo no nyinaa bɔɔ kirididi sianee ɔbotan kuronkuron no kɔguu ɛpo no mu. Na wɔbɛyɛ sɛ mpennu, na wɔteetee wuwui ɛpo no mu.
Na wɔn a wɔhwɛ mprako no dwanee, na wɔkɔkaa no kuro no mu ne nkuraa no ase. Na wɔfirii adi sɛ wɔrekɔhwɛ deɛ aba no.
Na wɔbaa Yesu nkyɛn, na wɔbɛhunuu deɛ honhommɔne a ɔde ɛdɔm no wɔ ne so sɛ ɔte hɔ fira ntoma, na n’adwene mu ateɛ no; wɔsuroe.
Na wɔn a wɔhunuiɛ no kaa deɛ ɛyɛɛ deɛ honhommɔne wɔ ne soɔ no, ne mprako no ho asɛm no kyerɛɛ wɔn.
Na wɔfirii aseɛ srɛɛ Yesu sɛ ɔmfiri wɔn asase so nkɔ.
Na ɔsii kodoɔ no mu no, deɛ anka honhommɔne wɔ ne soɔ no srɛɛ no sɛ ɔbɛtena ne nkyɛn.
Nanso wamma no kwan, na ɔsee no sɛ:

wj.content: Kɔ wo fie, w’abusuafoɔ nkyɛn, na kɔka nnoɔma a Awurade ayɛ ama woɔ ne mmɔborɔ a wahu woɔ no kyerɛ wɔn.

verse.content: Na ɔsii mu kɔe, na ɔkɔfitii aseɛ kaa nnoɔma akɛseɛ a Yesu yɛ maa no no wɔ Dekapoli; na ɛyɛɛ wɔn nyinaa nwanwa.
Na Yesu tenaa kodoɔ no mu twaa ɛpo no baa asuogya bio no, nkurɔfokuo pii bɛhyiaa ne nkyɛn; na ɔwɔ mpoano.
Na hyiadan mu panin baako a wɔfrɛ no Yairo bae, na ɔhunuu no no, ɔhwee ne nan ase;
na ɔsrɛɛ no pii sɛ: Me babaa rewu, na bra na fa wo nsa bɛgu ne so, na ne ho nyɛ no den, na ɔnnya nkwa.
Na ɔne no sii mu kɔe; na nkurɔfokuo pii dii n’akyi, na wɔkyeree ne so.
Na ɔbaa bi a mogya atu no mfirinhyia dummienu,
na wahunu amane pii ayaresafoɔ bebree nsam, na wahwere n’ahodeɛ nyinaa, na anyɛ no yie biara, na mmom ɛkɔɔ soɔ no,
ɔtee Yesu nka no, ɔbɛfirii n’akyi nkurɔfokuo no mu, de ne nsa bɛkaa n’atadeɛ.
Na ɔkaa sɛ: Sɛ mede me nsa meka n’atadeɛ nko ara a, me ho bɛyɛ me den.
Na ntɛm ara mogya a ɛretu no no twae, na ɔtee ne honam mu sɛ ne yadeɛ no agyae.
Na ntɛm ara Yesu hunuu ne mu sɛ ahoɔden bi afiri ne mu, na ɔdanee ne ho nkurɔfokuo no mu kaa sɛ:

wj.content: Hwan na ɔde ne ho kaa m’atadeɛ?

verse.content: Ɛnna n’asuafoɔ no see no sɛ: Woahunu sɛ nkurɔfokuo no kyere wo so, na wose:

wj.content: Hwan na ɔde ne ho kaa me?

verse.content: Na ɔtwaa n’ani sɛ ɔbɛhunu deɛ ɔyɛɛ adeɛ no.
Na ɔbaa no nim deɛ ayɛ wɔ ne mu nti, ɔde suro ne ahopopoɔ ba bɛhwee n’anim, na ɔkaa ne nokorɛ nyinaa kyerɛɛ no.
Na ɔsee no sɛ:

wj.content: Ɔbabaa, wo gyidie agye wo; kɔ asomdwoeɛ mu, wo yadeɛ no nnyae, na wo ho nyɛ wo den.

verse.content: Ɔgu so rekasa no, wɔfiri hyiadan mu panin no fie ba bɛkaa sɛ: Wo babaa no awu; adɛn na woda so ha ɔkyerɛkyerɛfoɔ no?
Na Yesu tee asɛm a wɔreka no, ɔsee hyiadan mu panin no sɛ:

wj.content: Nsuro, na gye di ara.

verse.content: Na wamma obiara anni n’akyi sɛ Petro, Yakobo ne Yakobo nua Yohane.
Na ɔduruu hyiadan mu panin no fie no, ɔbɛhunuu nnipa a wɔreyɛ gyegyeegye ne wɔn a wɔresu, na wɔreyɛ hoo pii.
Na ɔhyɛnee hɔ no, ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Adɛn na moreyɛ gyegyeegye na moresu? Abɔfra no nwui, wada.

verse.content: Na wɔseree no. Na Yesu pamm wɔn nyinaa, na ɔfaa abɔfra no agya ne ne na ne wɔn a wɔka ne ho no kɔɔ faako a abɔfra no da hɔ.
Na ɔsɔɔ abɔfra no nsa see no sɛ:

wj.content: Talita, Kumm!

verse.content: Aseɛ ne sɛ:

wj.content: Abaayewa, mese wo sɛ: Nyane!

verse.content: Na ntɛm ara abaayewa no sɔree na ɔnantee; (na wadi mfirinhyia dummienu). Na wɔn ho dwirii wɔn kɛse.
Na ɔhyɛɛ wɔn dendeenden sɛ wɔmmma obiara nnte; na ɔkaa sɛ wɔmma no biribi nni.
Na Yesu firi hɔ kɔe, na ɔbaa ne kurom; na n’asuafoɔ no dii n’akyi.

Na homeda duruiɛ no, ɔfitii aseɛ kyerɛkyerɛɛ wɔ hyiadan mu; na nnipa pii a wɔteeɛ no ho dwirii wɔn, na wɔkaa sɛ: Ɛhe na oyi kɔnyaa nnoɔma yi? Nyansa bɛn na wɔde ama no yi, na saa ahoɔdenneɛ a ɔde ne nsa yɛ yi aseɛ ne sɛn?
Ɛnyɛ duadwumfoɔ yi a ɔyɛ Maria ba no, Yakobo ne Yose ne Yuda ne Simon nom nua no nie? Na ɛnyɛ ne nuammaa na wɔwɔ yɛn nkyɛn ha yi? Na ɔyɛɛ suntidua maa wɔn.
Na Yesu see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Anidie mmɔ odiyifoɔ gye ne kurom ne n’abusuafoɔ mu ne ne fie.

verse.content: Na wantumi anyɛ ahoɔdenneɛ biara hɔ, gye ayarefoɔ kakraa bi na ɔde ne nsa guu wɔn so saa wɔn yadeɛ.
Na wɔn gye a wɔnnye nnie no yɛɛ no nwanwa. Na ɔkyinkyinii nkuraa no ase hyiae, na ɔkyerɛkyerɛe.
Na ɔfrɛɛ dummienu no baa ne nkyɛn na ɔfitii aseɛ somaa wɔn baanu baanu, na ɔmaa wɔn ahonhom fi so tumi.
Na ɔhyɛɛ sɛ wɔmmfa biribiara nntu kwan gye poma nko ara; wɔmmfa aduane anaa kotokuo, anaa sika wɔ wɔn abɔsoɔ mu;
na wɔnhyɛ mpaboa, nso wɔnnhyɛ ntadeɛ mmienu mmienu.
Na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Baabiara a mobɛhyɛne efie bi mu no, ɛhɔ na montena nkɔduru sɛ mobɛfiri hɔ akorɔ.
Na wɔn a wɔrennye mo, na wɔrentie mo asɛm no, sɛ morefiri hɔ akɔ a, momporoporo mo nan ase mfuturo nni wɔn adanseɛ.

verse.content: Na wɔkɔ kɔkaa asɛm sɛ wɔnsakyera wɔn adwene.
Na wɔtutuu ahonhommɔne bebree, na wɔde ngo sraa ayarefoɔ pii saa wɔn yadeɛ.
Na Ɔhene Herode tee; ɛfiri sɛ na Yesu din atrɛ, na ɔkaa sɛ: Yohane a na ɔbɔ asu no anyane afiri awufoɔ mu, enti na ahoɔdenneɛ yi di dwuma wɔ ne mu.
Na ebinom se: Ɛyɛ Elia; na ebinom nso se: Ɛyɛ odiyifoɔ te sɛ adiyifoɔ no mu baako.
Na Herode teeɛ no, ɔkaa sɛ: Yohane a metwaa ne tire no, ɔno na wanyane.
Na Herode no ara asoma ma wɔabɛsɔ Yohane mu, akyere no ato afiase, ne nua Filipo yere Herodia nti, ɛfiri sɛ na waware no.
Na Yohane aka akyerɛ Herode sɛ: Wonni ho kwan sɛ woware wo nua yere!
Na Herodia nyaa no menasepɔ, na ɔpɛɛ sɛ ɔkum no, nanso wantumi.
Na Herode suro Yohane, ɛfiri sɛ ɔnim sɛ ɔyɛ onipa tenenee ne kronkron; na ɔbɔɔ ne ho ban, na ɔretie no a, ne ho yera no pii, nanso ɔde anigyeɛ tiee no.
Na ɛda a ɛsɛ duruiɛ a Herode redi n’awoda no, ɔtoo pono maa n’atitire ne n’asafohene ne Galilea mpanimfoɔ,
na Herodia no ara babaa ba bɛsae, na ɔsɔɔ Herode ne wɔn a wɔne no te adidiiɛ no ani. Ɛnna ɔhene see ababaawa no sɛ: Bisa me biribiara a wopɛ, na mɛma wo.
Na ɔkaa no ntam sɛ: Adeɛ biara a wobɛbisa me no, mɛma wo, de kɔsi m’ahennie fa so.
Na ɔfirii adi kɔbisaa ne na sɛ: Ɛdeɛn na menkɔbisa? Na ɔkaa sɛ: Yohane a ɔbɔ asuo no ti.
Na ntɛm ara ɔde ahoɔherɛ baa ɔhene nkyɛn bɛkaa sɛ: Mepɛ sɛ wode Yohane subɔni no ti to plɛte so ma me seesei ara.
Na ɛyɛɛ ɔhene ya pii, nanso ne ntam ne wɔn a wɔne no te adidiiɛ no nti, wampɛ sɛ ɔkame no.
Na ntɛm ara ɔhene somaa ɔbrafoɔ, hyɛɛ sɛ wɔmfa ne tiri mmra. Na ɔkɔtwaa ne ti, afiase hɔ,
na ɔde ne tiri no too plɛte so baeɛ, na ɔde maa ababaawa no, na ababaawa no de kɔmaa ne na.
Na n’asuafoɔ no teeɛ no, wɔba bɛfaa n’amu no, na wɔde kɔtoo ɔboda bi mu.
Na asomafoɔ no boaboaa wɔn ano baa Yesu nkyɛn, na wɔbɛkaa deɛ wɔyɛeɛ ne deɛ wɔkyerɛkyerɛeɛ no nyinaa kyerɛɛ no!
Na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Mo nso mommra mmɛsene nkɔ ɛserɛ so fa baabi, na monkɔhome kakra.

verse.content: Na wɔn a wɔreba ne wɔn a wɔrekorɔ dɔɔso, na wɔannya adagyeɛ annidi mpo.
Na wɔde kodoɔ sii mu kɔɔ ɛserɛ so fa baabi.
Na nkurɔfoɔ hunuu wɔn sɛ wɔrekorɔ, nso na pii nim wɔn; na wɔnam fam firi nkuro no nyinaa mu tutuu mmirika kɔɔ hɔ, na wɔtwaree wɔn ano.
Na Yesu sii fam no, ɔhunuu nkurɔfokuo pii, na wɔyɛɛ no mmɔbɔ, ɛfiri sɛ na wɔte sɛ nnwan a wɔnni hwɛfoɔ; na ɔfitii aseɛ kyerɛkyerɛɛ wɔn nnoɔma pii.
Na onwunu reyɛ adwoɔ no, n’asuafoɔ no baa ne nkyɛn bɛkaa sɛ: Ɛha yɛ ɛserɛ so, na onwunu reyɛ adwo,
gya wɔn kwan na wɔnkɔ nkuro ne nkuraase a atwa ahyia yi mu nkɔtɔ paanoo bi nni.
Na ɔbua see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Mo ara momma wɔn biribi nni.

verse.content: Na wɔsee no sɛ: Yɛnkɔ nkɔtɔ paanoo denare ahanu, na yɛmfa mma wɔnni anaa?
Na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Paanoo ahe na mowɔ? Monkɔ nkɔhwɛ.

verse.content: Na wɔkɔhwɛeɛ no wɔkaa sɛ: Enum ne mpataa mmienu.
Na ɔhyɛɛ wɔn sɛ wɔmma wɔn nyinaa ntenatena ase akuakuo ɛserɛ mono no so.
Na wɔtenatenaa ase akuakuo, ɔha ɔha, ne aduonum aduonum.
Na ɔfaa paanoo nnum ne mpataa mmienu no, na ɔhwɛɛ soro hyiraa so, na ɔbubuu paanoo no, na ɔde maa n’asuafoɔ no sɛ wɔnkyekyɛ mma wɔn; na ɔkyekyɛɛ mpataa mmienu no nso mu maa wɔn nyinaa.
Na wɔn nyinaa didii, na wɔmeeɛ.
Na wɔtasee mporoporowa nkɛntɛn dummienu mama ne mpataa no nso bi.
Na wɔn a wɔdii paanoo no ano si mmarima mpemnum.
Na ntɛm ara na ɔpiapiaa n’asuafoɔ no sɛ wɔnkɔ kodoɔ mu, na wɔnni n’anim nkɔ asuogya nohoa, Betsaida fam, na ɔnnya nkurɔfokuo no kwan ansa.
Na ɔmaa wɔkɔeɛ no, ɔkɔɔ bepɔ so mpaebɔ.
Na ɛduruu anwummerɛ no na kodoɔ no wɔ ɛpo no mfimfini, na ɔno nko ara wɔ fam.
Na ɔhunuu wɔn sɛ wɔrebrɛ ɔhare mu; na mframa rehyia wɔn. Na ɛbɛyɛ anɔpahemahema nnɔnmmiɛnsa ne nnɔnnsia ntam no, ɔnam ɛpo ani baa wɔn nkyɛn; na ɔrepɛ asiane wɔn ho.
Na wɔhunuu no sɛ ɔnam ɛpo no ani no, wɔsusuu sɛ ɛyɛ ɔsaman, na wɔteateaa mu,
na wɔn nyinaa hunuu no, na wɔn akoma tui. Na ntɛm ara ɔne wɔn kasae, na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Momma mo bo ntɔ mo yam. Me ara; monnsuro.

verse.content: Na ɔkɔɔ wɔn nkyɛn kodoɔ no mu, na mframa no gyaee. Na wɔn ho dwirii wɔn boroo so.
Na wɔante paanoo ho asɛm no ase ɛfiri sɛ na wɔn akoma apirim.
Na wɔtwaeɛ no, wɔduruu Genesaret asase so, na wɔsii fam.
Na wɔfirii kodoɔ no mu no, ntɛm ara na wɔhunuu no;
na wɔde mmirika kɔkyinii asase a atwa ahyia no nyinaa so, na wɔfitii aseɛ soaa wɔn a wɔn ho nyɛ wɔn den kɛtɛ so de wɔn baa baabiara a wɔtee sɛ ɔwɔ.
Na baabiara a ɔkɔeɛ, nkuraase, anaa nkuro, anaa nkuraa mu no, wɔde ayarefoɔ bɛguu edwa mu; na wɔsrɛɛ no sɛ ɔmma wɔnka n’atadeɛ ano nnwo nko ara; na dodoɔ a wɔkaa no no, wɔn ho yɛɛ wɔn den!
Na Farisifoɔ ne Atwerɛfoɔ no mu binom a wɔfiri Yerusalem ba bɛhyiaa ne nkyɛn.
Na wɔhunuu n’asuafoɔ bi sɛ wɔde nsa a ɛho nteɛ, ɛne sɛ, nsa a wɔanhohorɔ, redidi.
(Na Farisifoɔ ne Yudafoɔ nyinaa, sɛ wɔanhohoro wɔn nsa yie a, wɔnnidi, ɛfiri sɛ wɔkura mpanimfoɔ atetesɛm mu;
na sɛ wɔfiri dwa ase ba, na wɔanhohoro wɔn ho a, wɔnnidi; na nnoɔma pii keka ho a wɔgyee sɛ wɔbɛkuta mu, nkuruwa ne mpɔɔdɔ ne kɔbere mfrafraeɛsɛn ne nnamu ho hohorɔ.)
Ɛnna Farisifoɔ ne Atwerɛfoɔ no bisaa no sɛ: Adɛn nti na w’asuafoɔ no nni mpanimfoɔ atetesɛm soɔ, na wɔde nsa fi didie yi?
Na ɔbua see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Ɛdi sɛ Yesaia hyɛɛ mo nyaatwomfoɔ ho nkɔm, sɛdeɛ wɔatwerɛ sɛ:
Ɔman yi de wɔn ano na ɛdi me ni,
na wɔn akoma deɛ atwe afiri me ho kɔ akyirikyiri.
Na wɔsɔre me kwa,
na wɔkyerɛkyerɛ nsɛm a nnipa ahyehyɛ.
Na moagya Nyankopɔn ahyɛdeɛ, kura nnipa atetesɛm mu.

verse.content: Na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Mofa nyansa kwan so po Nyankopɔn ahyɛdeɛ sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ na mobɛdi mo atetesɛm soɔ!
Na Mose kaa sɛ: Di w’agya ne wo na ni; ɛne: Deɛ ɔka agya anaa ɛna ho asɛmmɔne no, owuo na ma no nwuo!
Na mo deɛ, mose: Sɛ onipa bi se n’agya anaa ne na sɛ: Adeɛ a anka wode bɛnya me ho mfasoɔ no yɛ Korban (Ɛne sɛ, wɔde ma Onyankopɔn)
a,
na momma no nyɛ biribiara mma n’agya anaa ne na bio,
na mode mo atetesɛm a mokyerɛ no sɛe Nyankopɔn asɛm no, na nnoɔma a ɛte sɛ yeinom pii na moyɛ.

verse.content: Na ɔfrɛɛ nkurɔfokuo no nyinaa baa ne nkyɛn see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Mo nyinaa montie, na monte aseɛ!
Biribiara nni onipa ho a ɛkɔ ne mu a ɛbɛtumi agu ne ho fi.
(Sɛ obi wɔ aso a ɔde bɛtie a, ɔntie!)

verse.content: Na ɔfirii nkurɔfokuo no nkyɛn baa fie no, n’asuafoɔ no bisaa no bɛ no ase.
Na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Mo nso monni nteaseɛ sei? Monhunu sɛ adeɛ biara a ɛfiri onipa ho, na ɛkɔ ne mu no ntumi ngu ne ho fi anaa?
Ɛfiri sɛ ɛnkɔ n’akomam, na mmom ɛkɔ ɔyafunu mu, na mmom ɔyi gu yaane mu.

verse.content: (Ɔkaa yei de tee aduane nyinaa ho).
Na ɔkaa sɛ:

wj.content: Deɛ ɛfiri onipa mu ba no, ɛno na ɛgu onipa ho fi.
Na nnipa mu, wɔn akoma mu, na adwemmɔne firi ba: Adwamansɛm, akorɔnsɛm, awudisɛm,
ayerefasɛm, aniberebereɛ, amumuyɛ, nsisie, ahohwie, anibɔne, abususɛm, ahantan ne nkwaseasɛm.

verse.content: Nnebɔne yi nyinaa firi onipa mu na ɛba, na ɛgu onipa ho fi.
Na ɔsɔre firii hɔ kɔɔ Tiro ne Sidon fam. Na ɔkɔɔ efie bi mu, na wampɛ sɛ obiara teɛ; nso wantumi anhunta.
Na amonom hɔ ara ɔbaa bi a ne babaa kumaa bi wɔ honhom fi tee ne nka no, ɔba bɛhwee ne nan ase;
nso na ɔbaa no yɛ Helani, na n’awoɔ mu ɔyɛ Siro-Foinikeni; na ɔsrɛɛ no sɛ ɔntu honhommɔne no mfiri ne babaa no mu.
Na Yesu see no sɛ:

wj.content: Ma mma mmee ansa; na ɛnyɛ fɛ sɛ wɔfa mma aduane to ma nkraman.

verse.content: Na ɔbaa no bua see no sɛ: Awurade, ɛwom saa deɛ; nanso nkraman a wɔwɔ ɛpono ase no nso di mmɔfra no mporoporowa no bi!
Na Yesu see no sɛ:

wj.content: Asɛm yi nti, kɔ! Honhommɔne no afiri wo babaa no mu.

verse.content: Na ɔkɔɔ ne fie no, ɔkɔhunuu sɛ honhommɔne no afiri kɔ, na ne babaa no da mpa so.
Na ɔfiri Tiro ahyeɛ so nam Sidon baa Galilea po ho faa Dekapoli ahyeɛ so.
Na wɔde ɔsotifoɔ a ɔworo dodoɔ brɛɛ no, na wɔsrɛɛ no sɛ ɔmfa ne nsa nto ne so.
Na Yesu faa no firii nkurɔfokuo no mu kɔɔ nkyɛn de ne nsateaa hyehyɛɛ n’asom, na ɔtee ntasuo de kaa ne tɛkyerɛma,
na ɔhwɛɛ soro guu ahome, na ɔsee no sɛ:

wj.content: Hefata!

verse.content: ɛne sɛ: Bue!
Na n’aso buee, na ne tɛkyerɛma homa no sanee ntɛm ara, na ɔtumi kasaa yie.
Na ɔbaraa wɔn sɛ wɔnnka nkyerɛ obiara; nanso ɔrekɔ so bara wɔn no, na wɔrekɔ so pae mu ka.
Na ɛyɛɛ wɔn ahodwiri boroo so, na wɔkaa sɛ: Wayɛ nnoɔma nyinaa yie, ɔma asotifoɔ te asɛm, na ɔma emum kasa.
Nna no mu a nkurɔfokuo no dɔɔso bio na wɔnni biribi a wɔdie no, Yesu frɛɛ asuafoɔ no bae, see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Nkurɔfokuo yi yɛ me mmɔbɔ, ɛfiri sɛ wɔatena me nkyɛn atoa so nnansa ni, na wɔnni biribi a wɔdie.
Na sɛ megya wɔn kwan ma wɔde kɔm kɔ fie a, wɔbɛtotɔ baha ɔkwan mu; ɛfiri sɛ wɔn mu binom firi akyirikyiri na ɛbaeɛ.

verse.content: Na n’asuafoɔ no buaa no sɛ: Ɛhefa na obi bɛtumi anya paanoo a yeinom bɛdi amee wɔ anwea pradada so ha?
Na ɔbisaa wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Paanoo ahe na mowɔ?

verse.content: Na wɔkaa sɛ: Nson.
Na ɔhyɛɛ nkurɔfokuo no sɛ wɔntenatena fam. Na ɔfaa paanoo nson no daa ase bubui, na ɔde maa n’asuafoɔ no sɛ wɔnkyɛ mma wɔn; na wɔkyɛ maa nkurɔfokuo no.
Na wɔwɔ mpataa kakra bi; na ɔhyiraa so, kaa sɛ wɔnkyɛ ɛno nso mma wɔn.
Na wɔdi mee; na wɔtasee mporoporowa a ɛkaeɛ no, nkɛntɛn nson mama.
Na wɔn a wɔdiiɛ no bɛyɛ sɛ mpemnan. Na wɔgyaa wɔn kwan.
Na ntɛm ara ɔne n’asuafoɔ no kɔtenaa kodoɔ mu, na ɔbaa Dalmanuta fam.
Na Farisifoɔ no baeɛ, na wɔfitii aseɛ bisabisaa no nsɛm, hwehwɛɛ ne nkyɛn nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ a ɛfiri soro de sɔɔ no hwɛe.
Na ɔguu ahome ne honhom mu kaa sɛ:

wj.content: Adɛn na nnɛ mma yi hwehwɛ nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ yi? Nokorɛ mese mo sɛ, wɔremma nnɛ mma yi nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ biara.

verse.content: Na ɔgyaa wɔn hɔ kɔtenaa kodoɔ mu bio kɔɔ asuogya nohoa.
Na wɔn werɛ firii sɛ wɔfa paanoo, na na wɔnni biribi wɔn nkyɛn kodoɔ no mu sɛ paanoo baako pɛ.
Na Yesu see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Hwɛ, monhwɛ mo ho yie Farisifoɔ mmɔreka ne Herode mmɔreka ho!

verse.content: Na wɔdwendwene sesee wɔn ho sɛ wɔnni paanoo.
Na Yesu hunuiɛ no, ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Adɛn na modwendwene paanoo a monnie ho? Monnya nhunui, na montee aseɛ? Mo akoma da so apirim?
Mowɔ ani na monhunu adeɛ? Na mowɔ aso nso monte asɛm? Na monkae?
Mebubuu paanoo nnum memaa nnipa mpemnum no, mporoporowa nkɛntɛn ma ahe na motaseeɛ?

verse.content: Ɛnna wɔsee no sɛ: Dumienu.

wj.content: Na mebubuu nson no memaa nnipa mpemnan no, mporoporowa nkɛntɛn ma ahe na motaseeɛ?

verse.content: Ɛnna wɔse: Nson.
Na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Ɛnna afei monte aseɛ ara yi?

verse.content: Na wɔduruu Betsaida. Na wɔde onifirani bi brɛɛ no, na wɔsrɛɛ no sɛ ɔmfa ne nsa nka no.
Na ɔsɔɔ onifirani no nsa de no firii akuraa no ase, na ɔtee ntasuo guu n’ani so, de ne nsa guu ne so bisaa no sɛ:

wj.content: Wohunu adeɛ anaa?

verse.content: Na onifirani no maa n’ani so kaa sɛ: Aane, mehunu nnipa a ɛnenam hɔ, nanso mehu wɔn sɛ nnua.
Afei ɔde ne nsa guu n’ani so bio, na ɔhwɛɛ adeɛ haa; na ne ho sanee no, na ɔhunuu biribiara kann.
Na ɔmaa no kɔɔ ne fie see no sɛ:

wj.content: Nkɔ akuraa no mpo ase.

verse.content: Na Yesu ne n’asuafoɔ no firii hɔ kɔɔ Kaesarea Filipi nkuraa ase. Na ɔkwan mu no, ɔbisaa n’asuafoɔ no sɛ:

wj.content: Nnipa ka sɛ mene hwan?

verse.content: Na wɔbuaa no sɛ: Yohane suboni; na ebinom se: Elia; na ebinom nso se: Adiyifoɔ no mu baako.
Na ɔbisaa wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Na mo deɛ, mose mene hwan?

verse.content: Na Petro bua see no sɛ: Wone Kristo no.
Na ɔbaraa wɔn sɛ wɔnnka ne ho asɛm nnkyerɛ obiara.
Na ɔfitii aseɛ kyerɛkyerɛɛ wɔn sɛdeɛ ɛsɛ sɛ Onipa Ba no hunu amane pii, na mpanimfoɔ ne asɔfoɔ mpanin ne Atwerɛfoɔ no po no, na wɔkum no, na ne nnansa soɔ wasɔre;
na ɔkaa asɛm no pefee. Na Petro de no kɔɔ nkyɛn, fitii aseɛ kaa n’anim.
Na ɔdanee ne ho hwɛɛ n’asuafoɔ no kaa Petro anim sɛ:

wj.content: Firi me so, Satan, ɛfiri sɛ wonnwene Nyankopɔn deɛ, na mmom nnipa deɛ.

verse.content: Na ɔfrɛɛ nkurɔfokuo no ne n’asuafoɔ no bae, ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Obi pɛ sɛ ɔdi m’akyiri a, ɔmpa ne ho akyi, na ɔmfa n’asɛnnua, na ɔnni m’akyi.
Na obiara a ɔpɛ sɛ ɔgye ne kra nkwa no, ɛbɛfiri ne nsa; na deɛ ne kra bɛfiri ne nsa wɔ me ne asɛmpa no nti no, wɔbɛgye no nkwa!
Na sɛ onipa nya wiase nyinaa, na ɔhwere ne kra a, mfasoɔ bɛn na ɔbɛnya?
Anaasɛ ɛdeɛn na onipa bɛma de asesa ne kra?
Na obiara a n’ani bɛwu me ne me nsɛm ho, nnɛ mma awaresɛefoɔ ne nnebɔneyɛfoɔ yi mu no, ɔno nso ho bɛyɛ Onipa Ba no aniwu ɛda a ɔne abɔfoɔ kronkron no bɛba wɔ n’agya animuonyam mu no.

verse.content: Na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Nokorɛ mese mo sɛ wɔn a wɔgyina ha yi binom wɔ hɔ a wɔrenka owuo nhwɛ, de bɛkɔ akɔsi sɛ wɔbɛhunu Nyankopɔn ahennie no sɛ ɛde tumi aba.

verse.content: Na ɛno akyiri nnansia no, Yesu faa Petro ne Yakobo ne Yohane, na ɔde wɔn kɔɔ bepɔ tentene bi so fa baabi. Na ɔsakyerae wɔ wɔn anim,
na n’atadeɛ hyerɛnn fitafita a asase so ntomasifoɔ biara ntumi nhoa no saa.
Na Elia ne Mose yii wɔn ho adi kyerɛɛ wɔn, a na wɔne Yesu rekasa.
Na Petro see Yesu sɛ: Rabi, ɛyɛ sɛ yɛwɔ ha, na ma yɛmmɔ asese mmiɛnsa, wo deɛ baako, Mose deɛ baako na Elia deɛ baako.
Na ɔnnim asɛm a ɔnka mpo; ɛfiri sɛ na ɔsuro yie.
Na mununkum bi ba bɛkataa wɔn so, na ɛnne bi firi mununkum no mu kaa sɛ: Oyi ne me dɔba, montie no!
Na amonom hɔ ara, wɔtwitwaa wɔn ani no, wɔanhunu obiara sɛ Yesu nko ara ne wɔn.
Na wɔresiane bepɔ no, ɔbaraa wɔn sɛ wɔnnka deɛ wɔhunuiɛ no nnkyerɛ obiara, gye sɛ Onipa Ba no asɔre afiri awufoɔ mu ansa.
Na wɔmaa asɛm no kaa wɔn tirim, na wɔbisabisaa wɔn ho sɛ awufoɔ mu sɔreɛ no ne deɛn?
Na wɔbisaa Yesu sɛ: Adɛn nti na Atwerɛfoɔ no ka sɛ: Ɛsɛ sɛ Elia ba ansa?
Na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Elia ba ansa, na wabɛsiesie nnoɔma nyinaa mmom deɛ, na deɛ wɔatwerɛ no Onipa Ba no ho sɛ ɔbɛhunu amane pii, na wɔabu no animtia no ɛ?
Na mese mo sɛ: Elia aba dada, na wɔayɛ no deɛ wɔpɛ nyinaa sɛdeɛ wɔatwerɛ wɔ ne ho no.

verse.content: Na wɔduruu asuafoɔ no nkyɛn no, wɔhunuu nkurɔfokuo pii wɔ wɔn ho ne Atwerɛfoɔ sɛ wɔne wɔn rebisabisa wɔn ho nsɛm.
Na ntɛm ara a nkurɔfokuo no nyinaa hunuu no no, wɔn ho dwirii wɔn, na wɔde mmirika ba bɛkyeaa no.
Na Yesu bisaa wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Ɛdeɛn asɛm na mo ne wɔn rebisabisa mo ho yi?

verse.content: Na nkurɔfokuo no mu baako buaa sɛ: Kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ, mede me babarima a ɔwɔ mum honhom mebrɛɛ wo,
na baabiara a ɛsɔ ne mu no, ɛma no sensene, na n’ano retwa ahuro, na ɔretwɛre ne se, na ɔrefɔn. Na meka mekyerɛɛ w’asuafoɔ sɛ wɔntu no, na wɔantumi.
Na ɔbuaa wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: O ɛnnɛ mma a monni gyidie! Mentena mo nkyɛn nkɔduru da bɛn? Mentɔ me bo ase mma mo nkɔduru da bɛn? Momfa no mmrɛ me!

verse.content: Na wɔde no brɛɛ Yesu. Na ɔhunuu Yesu no, ntɛm ara na honhom no maa no senseneeɛ, na ɔhwee ase, na ɔbu faa so, na n’ano twaa ahuro.
Na ɔbisaa n’agya sɛ:

wj.content: Nna ahe ni a yei yɛɛ no?

verse.content: Na ɔkaa sɛ: Ɛfiri ne mmɔfraase;
na ɛtaa ka no to ogya ne nsuo mu sɛ ɛbɛkum no; na sɛ wobɛtumi ayɛ ho biribi a, hu yɛn mmɔbɔ na boa yɛn!
Na Yesu see no sɛ:

wj.content: Sɛ wobɛtumi a! Nnoɔma nyinaa bɛtumi ayɛ hɔ ama deɛ ɔgye die.

verse.content: Na ntɛm ara abɔfra no agya teaa mu kaa sɛ: Megye medi, na boa me wɔ m’akyinnye gyeɛ ho!
Na Yesu hunuu sɛ nkurɔfokuo no de mmirika reba no, ɔteateaa honhom fi no sɛ:

wj.content: Wo mum honhom ne sotifoɔ, mehyɛ wo sɛ, firi ne mu, na nsane nkɔ ne mu bio.

verse.content: Na ɛteaa mu, na ɛtwetwee no pii no, ɛfirii ne mu. Na ɔyɛɛ sɛ owufoɔ maa nnipa pii kaa sɛ: Wawu.
Na Yesu sɔɔ ne nsa maa no so, na ɔsɔree.
Na Yesu duruu fie no, n’asuafoɔ no bisaa no wɔ nkyɛn sɛ: Adɛn nti na yɛn deɛ yɛantumi antu no?
Na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Saa adeɛ yi deɛ, n’adeban, wɔntumi mfa biribiara ntu no, gye mpaebɔ [ne abuada].

verse.content: Na ɔfirii hɔnom no, wɔkɔtwaa mu Galilea, na wampɛ sɛ obi teɛ.
Na ɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ n’asuafoɔ no, na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Wɔde Onipa Ba no bɛhyɛ nnipa nsa, na wɔakum no, na wɔkum no a, ne nnansa so ɔbɛsɔre.

verse.content: Na wɔante asɛm no ase, na wɔsuroo sɛ wɔbɛbisa no.
Na wɔbaa Kapernaum. Na ɔwɔ fie no, ɔbisaa wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Ɛdeɛn na modwenwenee ho ɔkwan mu no?

verse.content: Na wɔmuaa wɔn ano; ɛfiri sɛ ɔkwan mu no wɔdwenwenee ho sɛ hwan ne wɔn mu ɔkɛseɛ.
Na ɔtenaa ase frɛɛ dummienu no, na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Sɛ obi pɛ kan adi a, ma no nni wɔn nyinaa akyi, na ɔnyɛ wɔn nyinaa somfoɔ.

verse.content: Na ɔfaa abɔfra bi de no gyinaa wɔn mfimfini, na ɔyɛɛ no atuu see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Obiara a ɔbɛgye saa mmɔfra yi mu baako me din mu no, gye me; na obiara a ɔbɛgye me no, ɛnyɛ me na ɔgye me, na deɛ ɔsomaa me no.

verse.content: Na Yohane see no sɛ: Kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ, yɛahunu obi sɛ ɔde wo din retu ahonhommɔne, na yɛbaraa no, ɛfiri sɛ ɔnni yɛn akyi.
Ɛnna Yesu kaa sɛ:

wj.content: Mommmara no; na obiara nni hɔ a ɔde me din bɛyɛ ahoɔdenneɛ na ɔbɛtumi aka me ho asɛmmɔne ɛhɔ ara.
Na deɛ ɔnyɛ biribi ntia yɛn no, na ɔwɔ yɛn afa.
Na obiara a ɔbɛma mo nsuo kuruwa ma anom wɔ me din mu, sɛ moyɛ Kristo dea nti, nokorɛ mese mo sɛ: N’akatua remmɔ no.
Na obiara a ɔbɛto nkumaa yi a wɔgye me die yi mu baako suntidua no, ɛyɛ ma no mmom sɛ wɔde owiyammoɔ kɛseɛ sɛne ne kɔn mu na wɔde no kɔto po mu.
Na sɛ wo nsa to wo suntidua a, twa! Ɛyɛ ma wo sɛ wode basasini bɛkɔ nkwa mu, sene sɛ wowɔ nsa mmienu na wode bɛkɔ amanehunu kurom, ogya a ɛrennum da no mu,
[deɛ wɔn aboaa nnwuo na ogya no nnum.]
Na sɛ wo nan to wo suntidua a, twa! Ɛyɛ ma wo sɛ wode nansini bɛkɔ nkwa mu sene sɛ wowɔ nan mmienu, na wɔde wo bɛto amanehunu kurom,
[deɛ wɔn aboaa nnwuo na ogya no nnum.]
Na sɛ w’ani to wo suntidua a, tu! Ɛyɛ ma wo sɛ wode ani korɔ bɛkɔ Nyankopɔn ahennie mu sene sɛ wowɔ ani mmienu, na wɔde wo bɛto amanehunu kurom,
deɛ wɔn aboaa nnwuo, na ogya no nnum.
Na wɔde ogya bɛhyɛ nnipa nyinaa nkyene. [Na wɔde nkyene bɛto afɔdeɛ nyinaa mu.]
Nkyene yɛ; na sɛ nkyene dɛ tu firi mu a, ɛdeɛn na mode bɛhyɛ no nkyene? Monnya nkyene mo ara mo mu, na mone mo ho mo ho ntena asomdwoeɛ mu.

note.content: Tete atwerɛ afoforɔ a wɔgye to mu no binom mfa yei nka ho.
Tete atwerɛ a wɔgye to mu binom mfa
deɛ wɔn aboaa nnwuo na ogya no nnum nka ho.
Tete atwerɛ a wɔgye to mu binom mfa
na wɔde nkyene bɛto afɔdeɛ nyinaa mu nka ho.

verse.content: Na ɔsɔre firii hɔ baa Yudea fam ne Yordan agya nohoa; na nkurɔfoɔ akuakuo boaboaa wɔn ano baa ne nkyɛn bio, na sɛdeɛ ɔyɛ daa no, ɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ wɔn bio.
Na Farisifoɔ no ba bɛbisaa no sɛ: Ɔbarima wɔ ho kwan sɛ ɔgyaa ne yere anaa? Na wɔde resɔ no ahwɛ.
Na ɔbua see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Ɛdeɛn na Mose hyɛɛ mo no?

verse.content: Na wɔkaa sɛ: Mose maa kwan sɛ ɔntwerɛ awaregyaeɛ nwoma mma no na ɔnnyae no.
Na Yesu bua see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Mo akomaden nti na ɔtwerɛɛ saa ahyɛdeɛ yi maa mo;
na ɛfiri adebɔ mfitiaseɛ no, ɔbarima ne ɔbaa na Onyankopɔn bɔɔ wɔn.
Yei nti na ɔbarima bɛgya n’agya ne ne na hɔ, na ɔde ne ho akɔbɔ ne yere ho,
na wɔn baanu akɔyɛ ɔhonam koro. Ne saa nti, wɔnna so nyɛ baanu bio, na mmom wɔyɛ honam koro.
Enti deɛ Onyankopɔn de abom no, mma onipa nntete mu.

verse.content: Na ɔwɔ fie no, n’asuafoɔ no bisaa no asɛm no ara bio.
Na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Obiara a ɔbɛgyaa ne yere na ɔbɛware ɔfoforɔ no, na wasɛe awadeɛ ɔbaa no fam,
na sɛ ɔbaa no nso gyaa ne kunu na ɔware ɔfoforɔ a, na wasɛe awadeɛ.

verse.content: Na wɔde mmɔfra brɛɛ no sɛ ɔmfa ne nsa ngu wɔn so, na n’asuafoɔ no kaa wɔn a wɔde wɔn baeɛ no anim.
Na Yesu hunuiɛ no, anyɛ no abodwo, na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Momma mmɔfra no kwan, na wɔmmra me nkyɛn, na monnsi wɔn kwan, na yeinom sɛɛ na Nyankopɔn ahennie no yɛ wɔn dea.
Nokorɛ mese mo sɛ: Obiara a ɔrennye Nyankopɔn ahennie sɛ abɔfra no, ɔrenkɔ mu koraa.

verse.content: Na ɔyɛɛ wɔn atuu, de ne nsa guu wɔn so hyiraa wɔn.
Na ɔfirii adi kɔɔ ɔkwan soɔ no, obi tutuu mmirika bɛkotoo n’anim bisaa no sɛ: Kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ pa, ɛdeɛn na menyɛ, na manya daa nkwa?
Na Yesu see no sɛ:

wj.content: Adɛn na wofrɛ me papa? Obiara nyɛ papa, gye ɔbaako, ɔno ne Onyankopɔn.
Wonim mmara nsɛm no: Nni awu! Nsɛe awadeɛ! Mmɔ korɔno! Nni adansekurumu! Nsisi! Di w’agya ne wo na ni.

verse.content: Na ɔsee no sɛ: Kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ, yeinom nyinaa mefiri me mmɔfraase na medii soɔ.
Na Yesu hwɛɛ no dinn, na ɔdɔɔ no, na ɔsee no sɛ:

wj.content: Aka wo adeɛ baako: Kɔ na kɔtɔn deɛ wowɔ nyinaa, na fa ma ahiafoɔ, na wobɛnya agyapadeɛ ɔsoro; na bra bɛdi m’akyi.

verse.content: Na asɛm no nti ɔmunae de awerɛhoɔ kɔe; ɛfiri sɛ na ɔwɔ ahonyadeɛ bebree.
Ɛnna Yesu hwɛɛ ne ho hyiaeɛ, see n’asuafoɔ no sɛ:

wj.content: Sɛ moahunu den a ɛyɛ ma wɔn a wɔwɔ ahonyadeɛ sɛ wɔbɛkɔ Nyankopɔn ahennie mu!

verse.content: Na ne nsɛm no yɛɛ asuafoɔ no ahodwiri. Na Yesu bua see wɔn bio sɛ:

wj.content: Mma, sɛ moahunu den a ɛyɛ ma wɔn [a wɔde wɔn ho to ahonyadeɛ soɔ]
sɛ wɔbɛkɔ Nyankopɔn ahennie mu!
Ɛyɛ mmerɛ sɛ yoma bɛfa paneɛ aniwa mu sene sɛ ɔdefoɔ bɛkɔ Nyankopɔn ahennie mu.

verse.content: Na ɛyɛɛ wɔn ahodwiri boroo so; na wɔsesee wɔn ho sɛ: Ɛnneɛ na hwan na wɔbɛtumi agye no nkwa?
Na Yesu hwɛɛ wɔn kaa sɛ:

wj.content: Nnipa fam na ɛntumi nyɛ hɔ, na ɛnyɛ Nyankopɔn fam; ɛfiri sɛ Nyankopɔn fam deɛ nnoɔma nyinaa bɛtumi ayɛ hɔ.

verse.content: Na Petro fitii aseɛ see no sɛ: Hwɛ, yɛagya nnoɔma nyinaa hɔ abɛdi w’akyi.
Na Yesu kaa sɛ:

wj.content: Nokorɛ mese mo sɛ obiara nni hɔ a wagya efie anaa nua mmarimanom, anaa nua mmaanom, anaa ɛna, anaa agya, anaa mma, anaa nsase, me ne asɛmpa no nti,
na ɔrennya afie, ne nuammarimanom, ne nuammaanom, ne ɛnanom, ne mma ne nsase mmɔho ɔha a ɔtaa ka ho, seesei wɔ ɛberɛ yi mu ne daa nkwa, wiase a ɛreba no mu.
Na adikanfoɔ pii bɛka akyire, na akyikafoɔ abɛdi kan.

verse.content: Na wɔnam ɔkwan so rekɔ Yerusalem; na Yesu di wɔn anim, na ɛyɛɛ wɔn ahodwiri, na na wɔn a wɔdi n’akyiri no suro. Na ɔfaa dummienu no bio fitii aseɛ kaa nnoɔma a ɛbɛba ne soɔ kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Hwɛ, yɛrekɔ Yerusalem, na wɔbɛyi Onipa Ba no ahyɛ asɔfoɔ mpanimfoɔ ne Atwerɛfoɔ nsa, na wɔabua no kumfɔ, na wɔayi no ama wiase amanaman mufoɔ,
na wɔagoro ne ho na wɔatete ntasuo agu ne so, na wɔaka no mpire, na wɔakum no; na ne nnansa soɔ no, wasɔre bio.

verse.content: Na Sebedeo mma Yakobo ne Yohane baa ne nkyɛn bɛsee no sɛ: Kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ, yɛpɛ sɛ biribiara a yɛbɛsrɛ woɔ no, woyɛ ma yɛn.
Na ɔbisaa wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Ɛdeɛn na mopɛ sɛ meyɛ mema mo?

verse.content: Na wɔsee no sɛ: Deɛ yɛ ma yɛn ne sɛ: Ma yɛn mu baako ntena wo nifa, na ɔbaako ntena wo benkum, w’animuonyam mu.
Na Yesu see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Monnim deɛ morebisa. Mobɛtumi anom kuruwa a menom ano, anaasɛ mobɛma wɔde asubɔ a wɔde bɔ me no abɔ mo anaa?

verse.content: Na wɔbua see no sɛ: Yɛbɛtumi. Na Yesu see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Kuruwa a menom no deɛ mobɛnom, na asubɔ a wɔde bɔ me no, wɔde bɛbɔ mo;
na me nifa ne me benkum tena deɛ, ɛnyɛ me dea sɛdeɛ mede bɛma, na wɔde bɛma wɔn a wɔasiesie ama wɔn.

verse.content: Na edu no teeɛ no, Yakobo ne Yohane asɛm no anyɛ wɔn abodwo.
Na Yesu frɛɛ wɔn bae, na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Monim sɛ wɔn a wɔbu wɔn sɛ wɔdi wiase amanaman soɔ no di wɔn so sɛ awuranom, na wɔn mu akɛseɛ no di wɔn so tumi.
Nanso ɛnte saa mo mu; na obiara a ɔpɛ sɛ ɔbɛyɛ mo mu kɛseɛ no, ɔbɛyɛ somfoɔ,
na obiara a ɔpɛ sɛ ɔbɛdi mo kan no, ɔbɛyɛ mo nyinaa akoa.
Na Onipa Ba no nso amma sɛ wɔnsom no, na ɔbɛsomee, na ɔde ne kra ayɛ agyedeɛ ama nnipa pii.

verse.content: Wɔduruu Yeriko. Na ɔne n’asuafoɔ no ne nkurɔfokuo bebree refiri Yeriko akorɔ no, na Timeo ba Bartimeo, onifirani no, te kwankyɛn resrɛsrɛ adeɛ.
Na ɔtee sɛ ɛyɛ Yesu Nasareni no, ɔfitii aseɛ teaa mu sɛ: Dawid ba Yesu, hu me mmɔbɔ!
Na nnipa pii kaa n’anim sɛ ɔmmua n’ano; nanso ɔno deɛ, ɔkɔɔ so teateaa mu denden sɛ: Dawid ba, hu me mmɔbɔ!
Na Yesu gyina kaa sɛ:

wj.content: Momfrɛ no!

verse.content: Na wɔfrɛɛ onifirani no see no sɛ: Ma wo bo ntɔ wo yam, sɔre, ɔrefrɛ wo!
Na ɔtoo ne ntoma gui sɔre baa Yesu nkyɛn.
Yesu bisaa no sɛ:

wj.content: Ɛdeɛn na wopɛ sɛ meyɛ ma woɔ?

verse.content: Na onifirani no see no sɛ: Rabuni, mepɛ sɛ mehunu adeɛ!
Na Yesu see no sɛ:

wj.content: Kɔ, wo gyidie agye wo!

verse.content: Na ntɛm ara ɔhunuu adeɛ, na ɔdii n’akyi ɔkwan no so.

note.content: Tete atwerɛ afoforɔ a wɔgye to mu no bi mfa
a wɔde wɔn ho to ahonyadeɛ soɔ nka ho.

verse.content: Na wɔbɛnn Yerusalem, Betfage ne Betania a ɛwɔ Ngo Bepɔ ho no, ɔsomaa n’asuafoɔ no mu baanu,
na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Monkɔ akuraa a ɛda mo anim no ase. Na moduru hɔ pɛ a, mobɛhunu afunumu ba bi a wɔasa no homa a onipa biara ntenaa ne so da. Monsane no mfa no mmra.
Na sɛ obi bisa mo sɛ: Adɛn na moreyɛ yei a, monka sɛ: Ne ho hia Awurade; na ntɛm ara ɔbɛma mode no aba ha.

verse.content: Na wɔkɔ kɔhunuu afunumu ba no sɛ ɔsa ɛpono ano wɔ mfikyire, abɔntene, na wɔsanee no.
Na wɔn a wɔgyina hɔ no mu bi see wɔn sɛ: Moresane afunumu ba no ayɛ deɛn?
Na asuafoɔ no buaa wɔn sɛdeɛ Yesu kaeɛ no, na wɔmaa wɔn kwan.
Na wɔde afunumu ba no brɛɛ Yesu, na wɔde wɔn ntoma guu ne so; na ɔtenaa ne so.
Na nnipa bebree de wɔn ntoma sesɛɛ ɔkwan no so, na ebinom twitwaa nnua mman firi mfuo mu de sesɛɛ ɔkwan no so.
Na wɔn a wɔdi anim ne wɔn a wɔdi akyire teaa mu sɛ:

block_quote.content: Nhyira ne deɛ ɔnam Awurade din mu reba.
Nhyira ne yɛn agya Dawid ahennie a ɛreba no!

verse.content: Na ɔhyɛnee Yerusalem kɔɔ asɔrefie. Na ɔhwɛɛ nnoɔma nyinaa, na adeɛ reyɛ asa no, ɔne dummienu no firi kɔɔ Betania.
Na adeɛ kyeeɛ a wɔfiri Betania reba no, ɛkɔm dee no.
Na ɔhunuu borɔdɔma bi wɔ akyiri sɛ ahahan wɔ soɔ no, ɔkɔɔ hɔ sɛ ebia ɔbɛhunu biribi wɔ so anaa? Na ɔduruu ho no, wanhunu hwee sɛ ahahan nko ara; ɛfiri sɛ na borɔdɔma berɛ nnuruiɛ.
Na ɔkasa kyerɛɛ borɔdɔma no sɛ:

wj.content: Obiara renni wo so aba bio da!

verse.content: Na asuafoɔ no teeɛ.
Na wɔduruu Yerusalem. Na ɔkɔhyɛnee asɔrefie no mu no, ɔfitii aseɛ pamm wɔn a wɔtɔn ne wɔn a wɔtɔ adeɛ asɔrefie hɔ; na ɔbutuu sikasesafoɔ apono ne wɔn a wɔtɔn mmorɔnoma nkonnwa,
na wamma kwan amma obiara ansoa adeɛ amfa asɔrefie hɔ.
Na ɔkyerɛkyerɛe, see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Wɔntwerɛɛ sɛ:
Wɔbɛfrɛ me fie asɔrefie ama amanaman nyinaa?
Na mo deɛ, mode ayɛ adwotwafoɔ bɔn.

verse.content: Na asɔfoɔ mpanimfoɔ ne Atwerɛfoɔ no teeɛ, na wɔhwehwɛɛ sɛdeɛ wɔbɛkum no; nso na wɔsuro no, ɛfiri sɛ na ne nkyerɛkyerɛ yɛ nkurɔfokuo no nyinaa nwanwa.
Na adeɛ saeɛ no, ɔfirii kurom hɔ.
Na anɔpatutu a wɔretwam no, wɔhunuu sɛ borɔdɔma no awu firi ne nhini ase.
Na Petro kaee, see no sɛ: Rabi, hwɛ borɔdɔma a wodomee no no awu!
Na Yesu bua see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Monnya Nyankopɔn mu gyidie!
Na nokorɛ mese mo sɛ, obiara a ɔbɛse bepɔ yi sɛ: Ma wo ho so kɔhwe ɛpo mu, na ɔnnye akyinnyeɛ wɔ n’akoma mu, na ɔbɛgye adi sɛ deɛ ɔreka no bɛba mu no, ɛbɛyɛ hɔ ama no.
Yei nti, mese mo sɛ: Adeɛ biara a mobɛsrɛ mo mpaebɔ mu no, monnye nni sɛ mobɛnya, na ɛbɛyɛ hɔ ama mo.
Na sɛ mogyina hɔ rebɔ mpaeɛ, na mowɔ biribi tia obi a, momfa nkyɛ no, na mo Agya a ɔwɔ soro no nso de mo mfomsoɔ akyɛ mo.
[Na sɛ moamfa ankyɛ a, mo agya a ɔwɔ soro no remfa mo mfomsoɔ nkyɛ mo.]

verse.content: Na wɔbaa Yerusalem bio. Na ɔnenam asɔrefie no, asɔfoɔ mpanin ne Atwerɛfoɔ ne mpanimfoɔ no baa ne nkyɛn,
na wɔbisaa no sɛ: Tumi bɛn na wode yɛ nnoɔma yi? Anaasɛ hwan na ɔmaa wo tumi sɛ yɛ yeinom?
Na Yesu see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Mɛbisa mo asɛm baako, na mommua me, na mɛkyerɛ mo tumi ko a mede meyɛ yeinom:
Yohane asubɔ no, ɛfiri soro anaasɛ ɛfiri nnipa? Mommua me!

verse.content: Na wɔdwendwenee kekaa wɔn mu sɛ: Sɛ yɛka sɛ ɛfiri soro a, ɔbɛka sɛ: Ɛnneɛ ɛdeɛn nti na moannye no annie?
Anaasɛ yɛnka sɛ: Ɛfiri nnipa? Na wɔsuro nkurɔfokuo no, ɛfiri sɛ na nnipa nyinaa bu Yohane sɛ ɔyɛ odiyifoɔ ampa.
Na wɔbua see Yesu sɛ: Yɛnnim. Na Yesu se:

wj.content: Me nso merenka tumi ko a mede meyɛ yeinom menkyerɛ mo.

note.content: Tete atwerɛ afoforɔ a wɔgye to mu no bi mfa nkyekyɛmu 26 nka ho.

verse.content: Na ɔfitii aseɛ nam mmebuo so kasa kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Onipa bi yɛɛ bobe turo, na ɔgyee ho ban hyiae, na ɔtuu mu nsa-kyi-amena, na ɔtoo mu abantenten, na ɔde fɛm akuafoɔ bi, na ɔtuu bata.
Na ɛberɛ no duruiɛ no, ɔsomaa akoa kɔɔ akuafoɔ no nkyɛn sɛ, ɔnkɔgye bobe turom aduaba no bi akuafo no hɔ.
Na wɔfaa no hwee no maa no nam nsapan kɔe.
Na bio ɔsomaa akoa foforɔ bi kɔɔ wɔn nkyɛn; na ɔno nso wɔpiraa no wɔ ne tirim, na wɔguu n’anim ase.
Na ɔsomaa ɔfoforɔ; na ɔno deɛ, wɔkumm no; ɛne afoforɔ pii nso, na wɔhwee ebinom, na wɔkumm ebinom.
Nanso na aka no ɔbaako, ne ba a ɔdɔ no. Na akyire yi, ɔsomaa ɔno nso kɔɔ wɔn nkyɛn sɛ: Wɔbɛfɛre me ba.
Na akuafoɔ no deɛ, wɔsesee wɔn ho sɛ: Ɔdedifoɔ no nie; mommra mma yɛnkum no, na agyapadeɛ no ayɛ yɛn dea.
Na wɔfaa no kumm no, twee no firii bobe turom hɔ too no twenee.
Ɛdeɛn na bobe turo no wura no bɛyɛ? Ɔbɛba abɛsɛe akuafoɔ no, na ɔde bobe turo no ama afoforɔ.
Nso monkenkanee atwerɛ yi pɛn, sɛ:
Ɛboɔ a abantofoɔ apoɔ no,
ɛno ara na abɛyɛ ɔdan no ntweaso tiboɔ;
Awurade na ɔmaa yei baeɛ,
na ɛyɛ nwanwa yɛn ani so anaa?

verse.content: Na wɔhwehwɛɛ sɛ wɔkyere no, nanso na wɔsuro nkurɔfokuo no; na wɔhunuu sɛ ɛbɛ a ɔbuiɛ no, ɔne wɔn. Na wɔgyaa no hɔ sii mu kɔe.
Na wɔsomaa Farisifoɔ ne Herodefoɔ no mu bi baa ne nkyɛn sɛ wɔmmɛpɛ no asɛm.

Na wɔbaeɛ no, wɔsee no sɛ: Kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ, yɛnim sɛ woyɛ ɔnokwafoɔ na wonhwehwɛ biribi mfiri obi hɔ; na wonhwɛ nnipa anim, na wokyerɛkyerɛ Nyankopɔn kwan nokorɛ mu: Ɛwɔ ho kwan sɛ wɔyi toɔ ma Kaesare, anaasɛ wɔnyi? Yɛntua anaasɛ yɛnntua?
Na ɔhunuu wɔn nyaatwom no, ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Adɛn nti na mosɔ me hwɛ? Momfa denare bi mmrɛ me na menhwɛ.

verse.content: Na wɔde bae. Na ɔbisaa wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Hwan mfonini ne atwerɛ nie?

verse.content: Na wɔsee no sɛ: Kaesare dea.
Na Yesu bua see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Ɛnneɛ momfa Kaesare deɛ mma Kaesare, na momfa Nyankopɔn deɛ mma Onyankopɔn!

verse.content: Na ne ho yɛɛ wɔn nwanwa.
Na Sadukifoɔ a wɔka sɛ owusɔreɛ nni hɔ no baa ne nkyɛn bɛbisaa no sɛ:
Kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ, Mose twerɛ maa yɛn sɛ: Sɛ obi nua wu, na ɔgya yerɛ, na wannya mma a, ne nua no nware ne yere no, na ɔnwo mma mma ne nua no.
Nso anuanom baason bi tenaa ase, na deɛ ɔdi kan waree yerɛ; na ɔwuiɛ no, wannya mma.
Na deɛ ɔtɔ so mmienu no waree no, na ɔwui. Na ɔno nso wannya mma. Na deɛ ɔtɔ so mmiɛnsa no nso saa ara.
Enti nnipa baason no nyinaa waree no na wɔannya mma. Na wɔn nyinaa akyiri no ɔbaa no nso wui.
Na enti owusɔreɛ mu no, sɛ wɔnya sɔre a, wɔn mu hwan na ɔbɛyɛ ne yere? Ɛfiri sɛ nnipa baason no waree no.
Na Yesu see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Ɛnyɛ nim a monnim atwerɛsɛm ne Nyankopɔn tumi nti na mofom yi anaa?
Na wɔnya sɔre firi awufoɔ mu a, wɔnware, nso wɔmma awadeɛ, na wɔte sɛ abɔfoɔ wɔ soro.
Na ɛfa awufoɔ nyane ho deɛ, monkenkanee no Mose nwoma mu wɔ wira no ho sɛdeɛ Onyankopɔn see no sɛ: Mene Abraham Nyankopɔn ne Isak Nyankopɔn ne Yakob Nyankopɔn no?
Ampa ara, ɔnyɛ awufoɔ Nyankopɔn, na mmom ateasefoɔ Nyankopɔn. Na mo deɛ mofom pii.

verse.content: Na Atwerɛfoɔ no mu baako a ɔtee sɛ wɔregye akyinnyeɛ, na ɔhunuu sɛ wabua wɔn yie no ba bɛbisaa no sɛ: Mmara asɛm a ɛdi ne nyinaa kan ne deɛ ɛwɔ he?
Na Yesu buaa no sɛ:

wj.content: Deɛ ɛdi mmara nsɛm no nyinaa kan ne: Israel, tie, Awurade yɛn Nyankopɔn yɛ Awurade koro;
na dɔ Awurade wo Nyankopɔn firi w’akoma nyinaa mu ne wo kra nyinaa mu ne w’adwene nyinaa mu ne w’ahoɔden nyinaa mu.
Na deɛ ɛtɔ so mmienu nie: Dɔ wo yɔnko sɛ wo ho. Mmara asɛm biara nni hɔ a ɛkyɛne yeinom!

verse.content: Na ɔtwerɛfoɔ no see no sɛ: Wiɛ, kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ, ampa woaka no yie sɛ Onyankopɔn yɛ baako, na obiara nni hɔ sɛ ɔno nko ara;
na sɛ wobɛdɔ no afiri akoma nyinaa ne nteaseɛ nyinaa ne ahoɔden nyinaa mu, na wobɛdɔ wo yɔnko sɛ wo ho, sene ɔhyeɛ afɔdeɛ ne mogya afɔdeɛ nyinaa.
Na Yesu hunuu sɛ wabua no nyansam no, ɔsee no sɛ:

wj.content: Wo ne Nyankopɔn ahennie ntam kwan nware.

verse.content: Na obiara antumi ammisa no asɛm biara bio.
Na Yesu rekyerɛkyerɛ wɔ asɔrefie no, ɔkaa sɛ:

wj.content: Adɛn na Atwerɛfoɔ no ka sɛ Kristo yɛ Dawid ba?
Na Dawid no ara nam Honhom Kronkron mu kaa sɛ:
Awurade see me wura sɛ:
Tena me nifa kɔsi sɛ
mede w’atamfo bɛyɛ wo nan ntiasoɔ.

verse.content: Dawid no ara frɛ no Awurade; na ɛyɛɛ dɛn na ɔbɛyɛɛ ne ba? Na nkurɔfoɔ pii no ara de anigyeɛ tiee no.
Na ɔsee wɔn ne nkyerɛkyerɛ mu sɛ:

wj.content: Monhwɛ yie wɔ Atwerɛfoɔ a wɔpɛ ntadeɛ atentene mu nanteɛ, ne edwa ase nkyea
ne mpanimfoɔ nkonnwa hyia adan mu ne mpanimfoɔ tenaberɛ adidie ase ho;
wɔn na wɔbɔ akunafoɔ apoo, nanso wɔboapa bɔ mpaeɛ atentene kyerɛ. Yeinom na wɔbɛnya afobuo a ɛboro soɔ.

verse.content: Na Yesu kɔtenaa sika adaka no anim, ɔhwɛɛ sɛdeɛ nkurɔfoɔ no de sika regu adaka no mu; na adefoɔ pii de bebree bɛguu mu.
Na ɔbaa kunafoɔ hiani bi nso bae, na ɔde kaprɛba mmienu a ɛbɛyɛ kaprɛ bɛguu mu.
Na ɔfrɛɛ n’asuafoɔ no bae, na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Nokorɛ mese mo sɛ: Okunafoɔ hiani yi de deɛ ɛdɔɔso abɛgu mu sene wɔn a wɔde bi abɛgu sika adaka no mu nyinaa.
Na wɔn nyinaa firi deɛ wɔwɔ, na abu wɔn soɔ no mu, na wɔde bi abɛgu mu; na oyi deɛ, ɔfiri ne hia mu de deɛ ɔwɔ nyinaa, n’adeɛ nyinaa, na ɔde abɛgu mu.

verse.content: Na ɔrefiri asɔrefie hɔ no, n’asuafoɔ no mu baako see no sɛ: Kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ, hwɛ aboɔ bi ne aban bi!
Na Yesu see no sɛ:

wj.content: Woahunu adan akɛseɛ yi? Wɔrennya ɔboɔ a ɛda ɔboɔ so a wɔrennwiri ngu fam.

verse.content: Na ɔte Ngo Bepɔ no so asɔrefie ntentensoɔ no, Petro, Yakobo, Yohane ne Andrea bisaa no wɔ nkyɛn sɛ:
Kyerɛ yɛn ɛberɛ ko a yeinom bɛyɛ hɔ, na yeinom nyinaa rebɛba mu a, ɛho nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ ne deɛn?
Na Yesu fitii aseɛ see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Monhwɛ, na obi annaadaa mo.
Nnipa bebree bɛba me din mu abɛka sɛ: Mene no, na wɔabɛdaadaa nnipa pii.
Na sɛ mote ɔko ne akosɛm a, mommma mo akoma nntutu. Na ɛtwa sɛ ɛba, nanso na awieeɛ no nnya nnuruiɛ.
Na ɔman bɛsɔre ɔman so na ahennie asɔre ahennie so, na asasewosoɔ bɛba mmeammea, na ɛkɔm bɛba. Yeinom ne awoɔko yea mfitiaseɛ.
Na mo deɛ, monhwɛ mo ho yie! Na wɔbɛyi mo ama mpanimfoɔ badwa, na wɔahwe mo hyia adan mu, na me nti wɔde mo bɛgyina amradofoɔ ne ahemfo anim na moadi adanseɛ akyerɛ wɔn.
Na ɛtwa sɛ wɔka asɛmpa no kyerɛ amanaman nyinaa kane!
Na sɛ wɔde mo rekɔ akɔyi mo ama a, monnnwennwene deɛ mobɛka ho ansa; na deɛ wɔde bɛma mo ɛdɔn no ara mu no, ɛno na monka, ɛfiri sɛ, ɛnyɛ mo na mokasa, na ɛyɛ Honhom Kronkron no ara.
Na onua bɛyi onua ama owuo, na agya ayi ɔba ama, na mma asɔre awofoɔ so, na wɔama wɔakum wɔn.
Na me din nti, nnipa nyinaa bɛtane mo. Na deɛ ɔbɛgyina mu akɔduru awieeɛ no, ɔno na wɔbɛgye no nkwa.
Na sɛ mohunu akyiwadeɛ a ɛbɔ man no sɛ ɛgyina faako a ɛnsɛ no a, (ma deɛ ɔkenkan no nte aseɛ!) ɛno na ma wɔn a wɔwɔ Yudea nnwane nkɔ mmepɔ soɔ;
na deɛ ɔwɔ ɔdan atifi no nnsiane mmma fam, nanso ɔnnhyɛne mu mmmɛfa biribi ne fie.
Na deɛ ɔwɔ afuo mu no nnsane n’akyi mmmɛfa ne ntoma.
Na wɔn a wɔafa afuro ne wɔn a wɔma nufoɔ nna no mu no nnue!
Na mommɔ mpaeɛ na amma awɔ berɛ mu.
Na nna no bɛyɛ ahohiahia a ɛfiri Nyankopɔn adebɔ mfitiaseɛ de bɛduru nnɛ, ebi mmaa saa da, nanso ɛremma saa bio.
Na sɛ Awurade antwa nna no so a, anka wɔrennye ɔhonam biara nkwa; na wɔn a wɔayi wɔn, a wɔyii wɔn no nti, watwa nna no so.
Na ɛno na sɛ obi se mo sɛ: Hwɛ, Kristo no wɔ ha! Anaasɛ: Hwɛ, ɔwɔ hɔ! no a, monnnye nnni.
Na Kristo atorofoɔ ne adiyifoɔ atorofoɔ bɛsɔre, na wɔabɛyɛ nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ ne anwanwadeɛ, na sɛ ɛbɛtumi a, wɔbɛdaadaa wɔn a wɔayi wɔn no mpo.
Na mo deɛ, monhwɛ yie, ɛfiri sɛ, madi kan aka ne nyinaa akyerɛ mo.
Na nna no mu ahohiahia no akyiri no,
owia bɛduru sum,
na ɔsrane renhyerɛn,
na ɔsoro nsoromma bɛtutu ahwe fam,
na ɔsoro ahoɔden awoso.
Na ɛno na wɔbɛhunu Onipa Ba no sɛ ɔde tumi kɛseɛ ne animuonyam reba mununkum mu.
Ɛno na ɔbɛsoma n’abɔfoɔ na wɔakɔboaboa wɔn a wayi wɔn no ano afiri mframa nnan no mu, ɛfiri asase ano kɔpem ɔsoro ano.
Monsua borɔdɔma ho bɛ no. Sɛ ne mman nya yɛ frɔmfrɔm, na ɛreyiyi ahahan a, na monim sɛ ahuhuro berɛ abɛn.
Saa ara na mo nso, sɛ mohunu sɛ yeinom aba a, monhunu sɛ abɛn, na aduru apono ano!
Nokorɛ mese mo sɛ: Awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ yi rentwam, gye sɛ yeinom nyinaa aba ansa.
Ɔsoro ne asase bɛtwam, na me nsɛm deɛ ɛrentwam da.
Na ɛda no ne dɔn no deɛ, obi nnim, abɔfoɔ a wɔwɔ soro nso nnim, Ɔba no nso nnim, gye Agya no nko.
Monhwɛ yie, monwɛn, na mommɔ mpaeɛ! Na monnim ɛda ko a ɛberɛ no bɛduro.
Ɛte sɛ onipa a watu kwan agya ne fie, na wama ne nkoa tumi, na wama wɔn nyinaa wɔn adwuma mmaako mmaako, na wahyɛ ɔpono ano hwɛfoɔ sɛ ɔnwɛn!
Enti monwɛn! Na monnim da ko a efiewura no bɛba, anadwofa anaa ɔdasuo mu anaa akokɔbɔneeɛ anaa anɔpa,
na wammɛfiri mo mpofirim ammɛhu mo sɛ moadeda.
Na deɛ mese mo yi, meka mekyerɛ nnipa nyinaa sɛ: Monwɛn!

verse.content: Na aka nnanu na Twam ne Apiti afahyɛ aduro no, asɔfoɔ mpanimfoɔ ne Atwerɛfoɔ no hwehwɛɛ sɛdeɛ wɔbɛyɛ akye no nyansa mu, na wɔakum no.
Na wɔkaa sɛ: Ɛnyɛ afahyɛ no mu, na basabasa amma ɔman no mu.
Na ɔwɔ Betania, Simon kwatani no fie. Na ɔtenaa ɛpono ho no, ɔbaa bi a ɔkura sradehwam toa, a ngo hwamhwam a ne boɔ yɛ den wɔ mu bae, na ɔbɔɔ toa no hwie guu n’apampam.
Na ebinom wɔ hɔ a anyɛ wɔn abodwoɔ wɔ wɔn mu, na wɔkekaa sɛ: Adɛn nti na wɔsɛee ngo hwamhwam yi?
Anka wɔbɛtumi atɔn ngo hwamhwam yi agye bɛboro denare ahasa, na wɔde ama ahiafoɔ. Na wɔnwiinwii tiaa no.
Na Yesu kaa sɛ:

wj.content: Monnyaa no! Adɛn na moreha no? Wayɛ me ho adwuma pa.
Na mowɔ ahiafoɔ mo nkyɛn daa, na da biara a mopɛ no, motumi yɛ wɔn yie; na me deɛ monni me daa.
Wayɛ deɛ ɔbɛtumi; wadi kan asra me nipadua ama me sie da.
Nokorɛ mese mo sɛ, wiase baabiara a wɔbɛka asɛmpa yi no, deɛ ɔbaa yi ayɛ yi nso wɔbɛka de ayɛ no nkaeɛ.

verse.content: Na Yuda Iskariot, dummienu no mu baako, sii mu kɔɔ asɔfoɔ mpanimfoɔ no nkyɛn sɛ ɔbɛyi Yesu ama wɔn.
Na wɔteeɛ no, ɛyɛɛ wɔn anigyeɛ, na wɔhyɛɛ no bɔ sɛ wɔbɛma no sika bi, na ɔhwehwɛɛ sɛdeɛ ɔbɛnya kwan ayi no ama, ɛberɛ a ɛsɛ mu.
Na Apiti da a ɛdi kan a wɔkum Twam dwan no, n’asuafoɔ no bisaa no sɛ: Ɛhefa na wopɛ sɛ yɛkɔsiesie ma wokɔdi Twam no?
Na ɔsomaa n’asuafoɔ no mu baanu, na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Monkɔ kuro no mu. Na onipa bi a ɔso ahina bɛhyia mo; monni n’akyi,
na faako a ɔbɛhyɛne no, monse efiewura no sɛ: Kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ no se: Ɛhefa na ahɔhodan a mene m’asuafoɔ bɛdi mu Twam no wɔ?
Na ɔno ara bɛkyerɛ mo abansoro asa kɛseɛ bi a wɔahyehyɛ mu, na wɔasiesie mu; ɛhɔ na monsiesie Twam no mma yɛn.

verse.content: Na asuafoɔ no sii mu kɔe, na wɔduruu kuro no mu no, wɔhunuu sɛdeɛ ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn no, na wɔsiesiee Twam no.
Na ɛduruu anwummerɛ no, ɔne dummienu no baeɛ.
Na wɔte hɔ redidie no, Yesu kaa sɛ:

wj.content: Nokorɛ mese mo sɛ, mo a mone me redidie yi mu baako bɛyi me ama.

verse.content: Na wɔn werɛ hoe, na wɔfitii aseɛ bisabisaa no mmaako mmaako sɛ: Ɛyɛ me?
Na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Ɛyɛ dummienu no mu baako a ɔne me to nsa ayowa mu no a.
Onipa ba no rekɔ sɛdeɛ wɔatwerɛ ne ho deɛ, nanso onipa a ɔbɛyi Onipa Ba no ama no, nnue! Sɛ wɔanwo saa onipa no a, anka ɛyɛ ma no.

verse.content: Na wɔredidie no, Yesu faa paanoo hyiraa so bubui, na ɔde maa wɔn kaa sɛ:

wj.content: Monnye. Yei ne me honam!

verse.content: Na ɔfaa kuruwa no daa ase de maa wɔn, na wɔn nyinaa nomm bi.
Na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Yei ne me mogya a ɛyɛ apam foforɔ no mogya a nnipa bebree nti wɔrehwie aguo.
Nokorɛ mese mo sɛ, merennom bobe aba no bi bio de bɛkɔ akɔsi da a mɛnom no foforɔ Nyankopɔn ahennie no mu.

verse.content: Na wɔtoo dwom no, wɔfirii adi kɔɔ Ngo Bepɔ no so.
Ɛnna Yesu see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Mo nyinaa ɛbɛyɛ mo suntidua; ɛfiri sɛ, wɔatwerɛ sɛ:
Mɛbɔ odwanhwɛfoɔ no,
na nnwan no abɔ apete.
Na me wusɔreɛ akyiri no, mɛdi mo anim makɔ Galilea.

verse.content: Na Petro see no sɛ: Sɛ ɛbɛyɛ wɔn nyinaa suntidua mpo a, me deɛ, ɛrenyɛ me suntidua.
Na Yesu see no sɛ:

wj.content: Nokorɛ mese wo sɛ, ɛnnɛ anadwo yi, akokɔ remmɔn mprenu, na woapa me mprɛnsa.

verse.content: Na ɔno deɛ, ɔkasaa anibereɛ so sɛ: Sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ me ne wo wuo mpo a, merempa wo da! Na saa ara na wɔn nyinaa nso kaeɛ.
Na wɔduruu baabi a wɔfrɛ hɔ Getsemane, na ɔsee n’asuafoɔ no sɛ:

wj.content: Montena ha, na menkɔbɔ mpaeɛ ansa.

verse.content: Na ɔfaa Petro ne Yakobo ne Yohane kaa ne ho, na ne ho firii aseɛ hiahiaa no, na ne ho yeraa no.
Na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Awerɛhoɔ ahyɛ me kra so de kɔ owuo mu; montena ha, na monwɛn!

verse.content: Na ɔkɔɔ n’anim kakra kɔbutuu fam, na ɔbɔɔ mpaeɛ sɛ, sɛ ɛbɛtumi a, dɔn no nsiane ne ho nkɔ.
Na ɔkaa sɛ:

wj.content: Aba, Agya! Wotumi nnoɔma nyinaa yɛ; yi kuruwa yi firi me so kɔ! Nanso ɛnyɛ deɛ mepɛ, na deɛ wopɛ.

verse.content: Na ɔba bɛhunuu wɔn sɛ wɔada, na ɔsee Petro sɛ:

wj.content: Simon, woada? Woantumi anwɛn dɔnhwereɛ baako mpo?
Monwɛn, na mommɔ mpaeɛ, na moankɔ sɔhwɛ mu. Honhom no pɛ deɛ, nanso honam no yɛ mmerɛ.

verse.content: Na ɔsii mu bio kɔbɔɔ mpaeɛ kaa asɛnkorɔ no ara.
Na ɔsane ba bɛhunuu wɔn sɛ wɔada bio; na wɔn ani twan so, na wɔnhunu deɛ wɔmfa mmua no.
Na ɔbaa ne mprɛnsa so, na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Afei deɛ, monna, na monhome! Adɔɔso! Dɔn no adu; hwɛ wɔreyi Onipa Ba no ahyɛ nnebɔneyɛfoɔ nsa.
Monsɔre mma yɛnkɔ; hwɛ deɛ ɔreyi me ama no abɛn!

verse.content: Na amonom hɔ ara, ɔgu so rekasa no, Yuda, dummienu no mu baako, bae, na nkurɔfokuo bebree a wɔkurakura nkrantɛ ne mmaa firi asɔfoɔ mpanimfoɔ ne Atwerɛfoɔ ne mpanimfoɔ no nkyɛn ka ne ho.
Na deɛ ɔyii no maeɛ no ama wɔn nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ sɛ: Deɛ mɛfe n’ano no, ɔne no, monkye no, na monsɔ no mu yie mfa no nkɔ!
Na ɔduruiɛ no, ntɛm ara na ɔbaa ne nkyɛn bɛkaa sɛ: Rabi! Na ɔfee n’ano.
Na wɔde wɔn nsa kɔsɔɔ ne mu kyeree no.
Na wɔn a na wɔgyina hɔ no mu baako twee ne nkrantɛ de bɔɔ ɔsɔfo panin akoa twaa n’aso.
Na Yesu bisaa wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Moaba sɛdeɛ moreba odwotwafoɔ so, de nkrantɛ ne mmaa rebɛkyere me?
Daa a mewɔ mo nkyɛn asɔrefie rekyerɛkyerɛ no, moankye me; na sɛdeɛ atwerɛsɛm no bɛba mu ntira!

verse.content: Na asuafoɔ no nyinaa gyaa no hɔ dwanee.
Na aberanteɛ bi a ɔfira nwera de akata n’adagya soɔ dii n’akyi; na wɔkyeree no;
na ɔgyaa nwera no, firii wɔn nsa, de adagya dwanee.
Na wɔde Yesu kɔɔ ɔsɔfo panin no nkyɛn, na asɔfoɔ mpanimfoɔ ne mpanimfoɔ ne Atwerɛfoɔ no nyinaa bɛhyiae.
Na Petro dii n’akyi wɔ akyirikyiri kɔduruu ɔsɔfo panin no aban mu, na ɔne asomfo no kɔtenaa hɔ too gya.
Na asɔfoɔ mpanimfoɔ ne badwafoɔ no nyinaa hwehwɛɛ Yesu ho adanseɛ pɛɛ sɛ wɔkum no, nanso wɔannya bi.
Na nnipa pii dii adansekurumu tiaa no, nanso wɔn adanseɛ no anhyia.
Na ebinom sɔre dii adansekurumu tiaa no sɛ:
Yɛate sɛ ɔreka sɛ: Mɛdwiri asɔredan a wɔde nsa ayɛ yi, na nnansa mu mɛto bi a wɔamfa nsa anyɛ.
Na ɛno ho mpo adanseɛ no anhyia.
Na ɔsɔfo panin no sɔre gyinaa mfimfini bisaa Yesu sɛ: Wommua bi? Ɛdeɛn ho na yeinom redi adanseɛ tia woɔ yi?
Nanso ɔmuaa n’ano na wammua bi. Na ɔsɔfo panin no bisaa no bio, na ɔsee no sɛ: Wone Kristo no, Deɛ Wɔahyira no no ba no anaa?
Na Yesu kaa sɛ:

wj.content: Mene no,
na mobɛhunu Onipa Ba no
sɛ ɔte tumi nifa,
na ɔreba ɔsoro mununkum mu.

verse.content: Na ɔsɔfo panin no sunsuanee ne ntadeɛ mu kaa sɛ: Ɛdeɛn hia na ɛhia yɛn adansefoɔ bio?
Moate n’abususɛm no; modwene sɛn? Na wɔn nyinaa buu no fɔ sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ ɔwuo.
Na ebinom fitii aseɛ hinam ntasuo guu ne so, na wɔkataa n’ani, na wɔbobɔɔ no akuturuku, na wɔsee no sɛ: Hyɛ nkɔm! Na asomfo no bobɔɔ no asotorɔ.
Na Petro wɔ fam adihɔ no, ɔsɔfo panin no mmaawa mu baako bae,
na ɔhunuu Petro sɛ ɔreto gya no, ɔhwɛɛ no haa kaa sɛ: Wo nso wo ne Nasareni Yesu no na ɛnam!
Na Petro sanee sɛ: Mennim, na mente deɛ woreka yi ase mpo. Na ɔfirii adi kɔɔ ntwonoo mu, na akokɔ bɔnee.
Na abaawa no hunuu no bio, na ɔfitii aseɛ ka kyerɛɛ wɔn a wɔgyina hɔ no sɛ: Oyi fra wɔn mu bi.
Na ɔsanee bio. Na ɛkyɛree kakra no, wɔn a wɔgyina hɔ no ka kyerɛɛ Petro bio sɛ: Ampa ara wofra wɔn mu; ɛfiri sɛ woyɛ Galileani.
Na ɔfitii aseɛ dii nse, na ɔkekaa ntam sɛ: Mennim onipa a moreka ne ho asɛm yi.
Na amonom hɔ ara na akokɔ bɔnee ne mprenu soɔ. Na Petro kaee asɛm a Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no no sɛ: Na ne werɛ hoo pii, Na amonom hɔ ara na akokɔ bɔnee ne mprenu soɔ ma ɔsui!
Na ntɛm ara, ɛrekɔ anɔpa no, asɔfoɔ mpanimfoɔ ne Atwerɛfoɔ ne badwafoɔ no nyinaa tuu agyina, na wɔkyekyeree Yesu de no kɔ kɔhyɛɛ Pilato nsa.
Na Pilato bisaa no sɛ: Wone Yudafoɔ hene no anaa? Na Yesu bua see no sɛ:

wj.content: Wo na woreka.

verse.content: Na asɔfoɔ mpanin no totoo n’ano pii.
Na Pilato bisaa no bio sɛ: Wommua hwee? Hwɛ nsɛm pii a wɔreka gu wo soɔ yi?
Na Yesu ammua hwee bio, na ɛyɛɛ Pilato nwanwa.
Nso daa, afahyɛ no mu no, ɔgyaa odeduani baako a wɔsrɛ no ma wɔn.
Na obi wɔ hɔ a wɔfrɛ no Baraba a wɔagu no ne wɔn a wɔasɔre atia Aban, a wɔadi awu basabasa no mu no mpokyerɛ.
Na nkurɔfokuo no kɔ kɔfitii aseɛ srɛɛ no dendeenden, sɛ ɔnyɛ sɛdeɛ ɔyɛ ma wɔn daa no.
Na Pilato bua see wɔn sɛ: Mopɛ sɛ megyaa Yudafoɔ hene no mema mo?
Na ɔhunuu sɛ nitan nti na asɔfoɔ mpanimfoɔ no yii no maeɛ.
Na asɔfoɔ mpanimfoɔ no hwanyann nkurɔfokuo no mu sɛ wɔmma ɔnnyaa Baraba mmom mma wɔn.
Na Pilato bua see wɔn bio sɛ: Ɛdeɛn na mopɛ sɛ meyɛ deɛ mofrɛ no Yudafoɔ hene no?
Na wɔteaa mu bio sɛ: Bɔ no asɛnnua mu!
Na Pilato bisaa wɔn sɛ: Adɛn, bɔne bɛn na wayɛ? Na wɔteaa mu dendeenden sɛ: Bɔ no asɛnnua mu.
Na Pilato pɛɛ sɛ ɔsɔ nkurɔfoɔ no ani nti, ɔgyaee Baraba maa wɔn; na Yesu deɛ, ɔhwee no mpire no, ɔyii no maa wɔn sɛ wɔnkɔbɔ no asɛnnua mu.
Na asraafoɔ no de no kɔɔ Amrado aban no adihɔ hɔ, na wɔfrɛɛ asraafoɔkuo no nyinaa hyiae.
Na wɔhyɛɛ no atadeɛ kɔkɔɔ bi, na wɔnwonoo nkasɛɛ abotire hyɛɛ no,
na wɔfitii aseɛ kyeaa no sɛ: Mo, Yudafoɔ hene!
Na wɔde demmire paee n’apampam, na wɔtotoo ntasuo guu ne so, na wɔbuu nkotodwe sɔree no.
Na wɔwiee ne ho agorɔdie no, wɔyii atadeɛ kɔkɔɔ no, de ɔno ara n’atadeɛ hyɛɛ no. Na wɔde no kɔɔ sɛ wɔrekɔbɔ no asɛnnua mu.
Na wɔhyɛɛ Simon, Kireneni bi a ɔfiri afuom retwam, a ɔyɛ Aleksandro ne Rufo agya, sɛ ɔnsoa n’asɛnnua no.
Na wɔde no kɔduruu baabi a wɔfrɛ no Golgota; (ne nkyerɛaseɛ ne Tikwankoraa Bea).
Na wɔmaa no nsa a wɔde aduhwam afra mu, nanso wannom.
Na wɔbɔɔ no asɛnnua mu, na wɔkyekyɛɛ ne ntadeɛ mu twee so ntonto, hwehwɛɛ deɛ ɛbɛyɛ obiara deɛ.
Na ɛbɛyɛ anɔpa nnɔnkron mu na wɔbɔɔ no asɛnnua mu.
Na wɔtwerɛɛ afodisɛm no wɔ atifi sɛ: YUDAFOƆ HENE NO!
Na wɔsɛnee akwanmukafoɔ baanu kaa ne ho, ɔbaako wɔ ne nifa, na ɔbaako wɔ ne benkum;
[na atwerɛsɛm a ɛse: Wɔakan no afra amumuyɛfoɔ mu no baa mu.]
Na wɔn a wɔretwam no kaa abususɛm tiaa no, wosoo wɔn ti kaa sɛ: Ao, wo a wodwiri asɔredan, na wosi no nnansa nie!
Gye wo ho, na firi asɛnnua no so si fam!
Saa ara na asɔfoɔ mpanimfoɔ ne Atwerɛfoɔ no goroo ne ho wɔ wɔn ntam sɛ: Ɔgyee ebinom, na ɔntumi nnye ne ho.
Afei ma Kristo, Israel hene no, mfiri asɛnnua no so nsi fam, na yɛnhunu, na yɛnnye nni! Na wɔn a wɔbɔɔ wɔn ne no asɛnnua mu no nso yaa no.
Na ɛbɔɔ awia dummienu no, esum duruu asase no nyinaa so kɔsii nnɔnmmiɛnsa.
Na ɛbɔɔ awia nɔnmmiɛnsa no, Yesu de nne kɛseɛ teaa mu sɛ:

wj.content: Eloi, Eloi, lama sabaktani?

verse.content: A nkyerɛaseɛ ne:

wj.content: Me Nyankopɔn, me Nyankopɔn, adɛn nti na woapa me yi?

verse.content: Na wɔn a wɔgyina hɔ binom teeɛ no, wɔkaa sɛ: Hwɛ, ɔrefrɛ Elia!
Na ɔbaako tuu mmirika de sapɔ kɔbɔɔ nsa kekakeka bi mu de tuaa demmire ano, de maa no sɛ ɔnom, na ɔkaa sɛ: Monnyae mma yɛnhwɛ sɛ Elia bɛba abɛyi no asi fam anaa?
Na Yesu de nne kɛseɛ teaa mu no, ɔwui.
Na ntoma a ɛtwa asɔredan mu no mu tee mmienu firi soro bɛsii fam.
Na asraafoɔ ɔha so panin a ɔgyina n’anim ntentensoɔ no hunuu sɛ ɔteaa mu saa na ɔwuiɛ no, ɔkaa sɛ: Ampa ara, onipa yi yɛ Nyankopɔn ba!
Mmaa bi nso wɔ hɔ a na wɔgyina akyirikyiri rehwɛ; na Maria Magdalene nso ne Yakobo kumaa ne Yose ne na Maria, ne Salome ka ho;
wɔn nso, ɔwɔ Galilea no, wɔdii n’akyi, na wɔsomm no, ne mmaa afoforɔ pii a wɔne no baa Yerusalem no.
Na ɛnya duruu anwummerɛ, na ɛyɛ ahosiesie da a ɛne da a ɛdi homeda anim no nti,
Yosef a ɔfiri Arimatea, ɔbadwani a ɔwɔ din pa a ɔno nso retwɛn Nyankopɔn ahennie no de akokoɔduro kɔɔ Pilato nkyɛn kɔsrɛɛ Yesu amu no.
Na Pilato adwene mu yɛɛ no naa, ɛfiri sɛ na ɔnnim sɛ wawu ampa anaa! na ɔfrɛɛ asraafoɔ ɔha so panin no bisaa no sɛ ɔwuiɛ akyɛ anaa?
Na ɔte firii asraafoɔ ɔha so panin no hɔ sɛ wawu no, ɔde amu no maa Yosef.
Na ɔtɔɔ nwera bi, na ɔyii no de nwera no kyekyeree ne ho, na ɔde no kɔtoo ɛda a wɔatwa no ɔbotan bi mu, na ɔmunii ɛboɔ hinii ɛda no ano.
Na Maria Magdalene ne Maria Yose ne na, hunuu faako a wɔde no toeɛ.

note.content: Tete atwerɛ a wɔgye to mu binom mfa nkyekyɛmu 28 nka ho.

verse.content: Na homeda no twaa mu no, Maria Magdalene, Yakobo ne na Maria ne Salome tɔɔ nnuhwam sɛ wɔde reba abɛsra no.
Na da a ɛdi nnawɔtwe kan anɔpahema, wɔbaa ɛda no so, na owia apue.
Na wɔsesee wɔn ho sɛ: Hwan na ɔbɛmuni ɔboɔ no afiri ɛda no ano ama yɛn?
Na wɔmaa wɔn ani so no, wɔhunuu sɛ ɔboɔ no amuni; nso na ɛso kokuroo.
Na wɔkɔɔ ɛda no mu no, wɔhunuu aberanteɛ bi sɛ ɔte nifa soɔ, hyɛ atadeɛ tentene fitaa, na wɔbɔɔ binim.
Na ɔsee wɔn sɛ: Mommmɔ binim; mohwehwɛ Yesu Nasareni a wɔbɔɔ no asɛnnua mu no. Wanyane, ɔnni ha. Hwɛ faako a wɔde no toeɛ!
Na monkɔ nkɔka nkyerɛ n’asuafoɔ ne Petro sɛ ɔredi mo anim akɔ Galilea; ɛhɔ na mobɛhu no, sɛdeɛ ɔka kyerɛɛ mo no.
Na wɔfirii adi ntɛm ara dwane firii ɛda no ho; na ahopopoɔ ne ahodwirie aka wɔn. Na wɔanka hwee ankyerɛ obiara; ɛfiri sɛ na wɔsuro.
[Na ɔsɔree da a ɛdi nnawɔtwe kan anɔpatutu no, ɔyii ne ho adi kane kyerɛɛ Maria Magdalene a ɔtuu ahonhommɔne nson firii ne mu no.
Na ɔkɔ kɔsee wɔn a wɔne no tenaeɛ a na wɔn werɛ ahoɔ na wɔresu no.
Na wɔn deɛ wɔtee sɛ ɔte aseɛ na wɔahu no no, wɔannye anni.
Yeinom akyiri no, ɔyii ne ho adi suban foforɔ mu kyerɛɛ wɔn mu baanu a na wɔnam rekɔ akuraa.
Na wɔn nso ba bɛka kyerɛɛ nkaeɛ no; na wɔannye wɔn nso anni.
Akyire yi a dubaako no te adidiiɛ no, ɔyii ne ho adi kyerɛɛ wɔn, na ɔkaa wɔn anim gye a wɔnnye nni no ne wɔn akomaden ho, sɛ wɔannye wɔn a wɔhunuu no sɛ wasɔre no annie nti.
Na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Monkɔ wiase nyinaa nkɔka asɛmpa no nkyerɛ abɔdeɛ nyinaa.
Deɛ ɔgye die, na wɔbɔ no asu no wɔbɛgye no nkwa, na deɛ ɔnnye nnie no, wɔbɛbu no fɔ.
Na nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ yi bɛdi wɔn a wɔbɛgye adie akyi: Me din mu, wɔbɛtu ahonhommɔne, wɔbɛkasa kasa foforɔ,
wɔbɛma awɔ so, na sɛ wɔnom adubɔne biara a, ɛrenyɛ wɔn hwee; wɔde nsa bɛgu ayarefoɔ so ama wɔn ho ayɛ wɔn den.

verse.content: Na afei, Awurade Yesu ne wɔn kasaeɛ akyiri no, wɔfaa no kɔɔ soro, na ɔkɔtenaa Nyankopɔn nifa.
Na wɔn deɛ, wɔfirii hɔ kɔ kɔkaa asɛm mmaa nyinaa, na Awurade ne wɔn yɛɛ adwuma, nam nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ a ɛka ho no so hyɛɛ asɛm no den.]
Amen.
